GP12vipce_pu:4385: viśvāmitras tathā rakṣo yajñopeto mahāmune // ViP_2,10.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4386: māseṣv eteṣu maitreya vasanty ete tu saptakāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4388: stuvanti munayaḥ sūryaṃ gandharvair gīyate puraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4389: nṛtyanty apsaraso yānti sūryasyānu niśācarāḥ // ViP_2,10.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4397: yad etad bhagavān āha gaṇaḥ saptavidho raveḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4398: maṇḍale himatāpādeḥ kāraṇaṃ tan mayā śrutam // ViP_2,11.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4402: kiṃ tvādityasya yat karma tan nātroktaṃ tvayā mune // ViP_2,11.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4403: yadi saptagaṇo vāri himam uṣṇaṃ ca varṣati /
GP12vipce_pu:4404: tat kim atra raver yena vṛṣṭiḥ sūryād itīryate // ViP_2,11.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4405: vivasvān udito madhye yāty astam iti kiṃ janaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4406: bravīty etat samaṃ karma yadi saptagaṇasya tat // ViP_2,11.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4408: maitreya śrūyatām etad yad bhavān paripṛcchati /
GP12vipce_pu:4409: yathā saptagaṇe 'py ekaḥ prādhānyenādhiko raviḥ // ViP_2,11.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4410: yā tu śaktiḥ parā viṣṇor ṛgyajuḥsāmasaṃjñitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4411: saiṣā trayī tapaty aṃho jagataś ca hinasti yat // ViP_2,11.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4412: saiṣa viṣṇuḥ sthitaḥ sthityāṃ jagataḥ pālanodyataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4414: māsi māsi ravir yo yas tatra tatra hi sā parā /
GP12vipce_pu:4415: trayīmayī viṣṇuśaktir avasthānaṃ karoti vai // ViP_2,11.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:4416: ṛcas tapanti pūrvāhṇe madhyāhne ca yajūṃṣy atha /
GP12vipce_pu:4417: bṛhadrathantarādīni sāmāny ahnaḥ kṣaye ravau // ViP_2,11.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4419: viṣṇuśaktir avasthānaṃ sadāditye karoti sā // ViP_2,11.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4420: na kevalaṃ raveḥ śaktir vaiṣṇavī sā trayīmayī /
GP12vipce_pu:4421: brahmātha puruṣo rudras trayam etat trayīmayam // ViP_2,11.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4422: sargādau ṛṅmayo brahmā sthitau viṣṇur yajurmayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4423: rudraḥ sāmamayo 'ntāya tasmāt tasyāśucir dhvaniḥ // ViP_2,11.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4424: evaṃ sā sāttvikī śaktir vaiṣṇavī yā trayīmayī /
GP12vipce_pu:4427: tamaḥ samastajagatāṃ nāśaṃ nayati cākhilam // ViP_2,11.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4428: stuvanti taṃ vai munayo gandharvair gīyate puraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4429: nṛtyanty apsaraso yānti tasya cānu niśācarāḥ // ViP_2,11.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4433: viṣṇur viṣṇoḥ pṛthak tasya gaṇaḥ saptavidho 'py ayam // ViP_2,11.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4436: evaṃ sā vaiṣṇavī śaktir naivāpaiti tato dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4437: māsānumāsaṃ bhāsvantam adhyāste tatra saṃsthitam // ViP_2,11.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4440: sūryaraśmiḥ suṣumṇo yas tarpitas tena candramāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4441: kṛṣṇapakṣe 'maraiḥ śaśvat pīyate vai sudhāmayaḥ // ViP_2,11.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4442: pītaṃ taṃ dvikalaṃ somaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣakṣaye dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4443: pibanti pitaras teṣāṃ bhāskarāt tarpaṇaṃ tathā // ViP_2,11.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4444: ādatte raśmibhir yaṃ tu kṣitisaṃsthaṃ rasaṃ raviḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4445: tam utsṛjati bhūtānāṃ puṣṭyarthaṃ sasyavṛddhaye // ViP_2,11.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4446: tena prīṇāty aśeṣāṇi bhūtāni bhagavān raviḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4448: pakṣatṛptiṃ tu devānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ caiva māsikīm /
GP12vipce_pu:4449: śaśvat tṛptiṃ ca martyānāṃ maitreyārkaḥ prayacchati // ViP_2,11.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:4453: rathas tricakraḥ somasya kundābhās tasya vājinaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4454: vāmadakṣiṇato yuktā daśa tena caraty asau // ViP_2,12.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4456: hrāsavṛddhikramas tasya raśmīnāṃ savitur yathā // ViP_2,12.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:4457: arkasyeva hi tasyāśvāḥ sakṛdyuktā vahanti te /
GP12vipce_pu:4459: kṣīṇaṃ pītaṃ suraiḥ somam āpyāyayati dīptimān /
GP12vipce_pu:4461: krameṇa yena pīto 'sau devais tena niśākaram /
GP12vipce_pu:4464: pibanti devā maitreya sudhāhārā yato 'marāḥ // ViP_2,12.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4466: trayas triṃśat tathā devāḥ pibanti kṣaṇadākaram // ViP_2,12.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4468: amākhyaraśmau vasati amāvāsyā tataḥ smṛtā // ViP_2,12.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4469: apsu tasminn ahorātre pūrvaṃ viśati candramāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4470: tato vīrutsu vasati prayāty arkaṃ tataḥ kramāt // ViP_2,12.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:4471: chinatti vīrudho yas tu vīrutsaṃsthe niśākare /
GP12vipce_pu:4472: patraṃ vā pātayaty ekaṃ brahmahatyāṃ sa vindati // ViP_2,12.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4475: pibanti dvikalaṃ somaṃ śiṣṭā tasya kalā tu yā /
GP12vipce_pu:4476: sudhāmṛtamayī puṇyā tām indoḥ pitaro mune // ViP_2,12.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4479: saumyā barhiṣadaś caiva agniṣvāttāś ca te tridhā // ViP_2,12.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4480: evaṃ devān site pakṣe kṛṣṇapakṣe tathā pitṝn /
GP12vipce_pu:4485: piśaṅgais turagair yuktaḥ so 'ṣṭābhir vāyuvegibhiḥ // ViP_2,12.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4487: sopāsaṅgapatākas tu śukrasyāpi ratho mahān // ViP_2,12.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4488: aṣṭāśvaḥ kāñcanaḥ śrīmān bhaumasyāpi ratho mahān /
GP12vipce_pu:4490: aṣṭābhiḥ pāṇḍarair yuktair vājibhiḥ kāñcane rathe /
GP12vipce_pu:4491: tasmiṃs tiṣṭhati varṣaṃ vai rāśau rāśau bṛhaspatiḥ // ViP_2,12.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:4493: samāruhya śanair yāti mandagāmī śanaiścaraḥ // ViP_2,12.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4494: svarbhānos turagā hy aṣṭau bhṛṅgābhā dhūsaraṃ ratham /
GP12vipce_pu:4495: sakṛdyuktās tu maitreya vahanty avirataṃ sadā // ViP_2,12.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4496: ādityān niḥsṛto rāhuḥ somaṃ gacchati parvasu /
GP12vipce_pu:4497: ādityam eti somāc ca punaḥ saureṣu parvasu // ViP_2,12.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4500: ete mayā grahāṇāṃ vai tavākhyātā rathā nava /
GP12vipce_pu:4501: sarve dhruve mahābhāga prabaddhā vāyuraśmibhiḥ // ViP_2,12.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4504: yāvantyaś caiva tārās tās tāvanto vātaraśmayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4505: sarve dhruve nibaddhās te bhramanto bhrāmayanti tam // ViP_2,12.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:4506: tailapīḍā yathā cakraṃ bhramanto bhrāmayanti vai /
GP12vipce_pu:4507: tathā bhramanti jyotīṃṣi vātaviddhāni sarvaśaḥ // ViP_2,12.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:4509: yasmāj jyotīṃṣi vahati pravahas tena sa smṛtaḥ // ViP_2,12.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:4510: śiśumāras tu yaḥ proktaḥ sa dhruvo yatra tiṣṭhati /
GP12vipce_pu:4511: saṃniveśaṃ ca tasyāpi śṛṇuṣva munisattama // ViP_2,12.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:4512: yad ahnā kurute pāpaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ niśi mucyate /
GP12vipce_pu:4513: yāvantyaś caiva tārās tāḥ śiśumārāśritā divi /
GP12vipce_pu:4514: tāvanty eva tu varṣāṇi jīvaty abhyadhikāni ca // ViP_2,12.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:4515: uttānapādas tasyātha vijñeyo hy uttaro hanuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4516: yajño 'dharaś ca vijñeyo dharmo mūrdhānam āśritaḥ // ViP_2,12.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:4518: varuṇaś cāryamā caiva paścime tasya sakthinī // ViP_2,12.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:4519: śiśnaṃ saṃvatsaras tasya mitro 'pānaṃ samāśritaḥ // ViP_2,12.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:4520: pucche 'gniś ca mahendraś ca kaśyapo 'tha tato dhruvaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4521: tārakā śiśumārasya nāstam eti catuṣṭayam // ViP_2,12.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:4522: ity eṣa saṃniveśo yaḥ pṛthivyā jyotiṣāṃ tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4523: dvīpānām udadhīnāṃ ca parvatānāṃ ca kīrtitaḥ // ViP_2,12.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:4524: varṣāṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca ye ca teṣu vasanti vai /
GP12vipce_pu:4525: teṣāṃ svarūpam ākhyātaṃ saṃkṣepāc chrūyatāṃ punaḥ // ViP_2,12.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:4526: yad ambu vaiṣṇavaḥ kāyas tato vipra vasuṃdharā /
GP12vipce_pu:4528: jyotīṃṣi viṣṇur bhuvanāni viṣṇur vanāni viṣṇur girayo diśaś ca /
GP12vipce_pu:4529: nadyaḥ samudrāś ca sa eva sarvaṃ yad asti yan nāsti ca vipravarya // ViP_2,12.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:4530: jñānasvarūpo bhagavān yato 'sāv aśeṣamūrtir na tu vastubhūtaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4531: tato hi śailābdhidharādibhedāñ jānīhi vijñānavijṛmbhitāni // ViP_2,12.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:4532: yadā tu śuddhaṃ nijarūpi sarvaṃ karmakṣaye jñānam apāstadoṣam /
GP12vipce_pu:4533: tadā hi saṃkalpataroḥ phalāni bhavanti no vastuṣu vastubhedāḥ // ViP_2,12.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:4534: vastv asti kiṃ kutracid ādimadhya paryantahīnaṃ satataikarūpam /
GP12vipce_pu:4535: yac cānyathātvaṃ dvija yāti bhūyo na tat tathā tatra kuto hi tattvam // ViP_2,12.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:4536: mahī ghaṭatvaṃ ghaṭataḥ kapālikā kapālikā cūrṇarajas tato 'ṇuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4537: janaiḥ svakarmastimitātmaniścayair ālakṣyate brūhi kim atra vastu // ViP_2,12.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:4538: tasmān na vijñānam ṛte 'sti kiṃcit kvacit kadācid dvija vastujātam /
GP12vipce_pu:4539: vijñānam ekaṃ nijakarmabheda vibhinnacittair bahudhābhyupetam // ViP_2,12.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:4541: ekaṃ sadaikaṃ paramaḥ pareśaḥ sa vāsudevo na yato 'nyad asti // ViP_2,12.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:4542: sadbhāva eṣo bhavato mayokto jñānaṃ yathā satyam asatyam anyat /
GP12vipce_pu:4543: etat tu yat saṃvyavahārabhūtaṃ tatrāpi coktaṃ bhuvanāśritaṃ te // ViP_2,12.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:4544: yajñaḥ paśur vahnir aśeṣa-ṛtvik somaḥ surāḥ svargamayaś ca kāmaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4545: ityādikarmāśritamārgadṛṣṭaṃ bhūrādibhogāś ca phalāni teṣām // ViP_2,12.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:4546: yac caitad bhuvanagataṃ mayā tavoktaṃ sarvatra vrajati hi karmavaśya ekaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4547: jñātvaivaṃ dhruvam acalaṃ sadaikarūpaṃ tat kuryād viśati hi yena vāsudevam // ViP_2,12.47 //
GP12vipce_pu:4551: bhagavan samyag ākhyātaṃ yat pṛṣṭo 'si mayākhilam /
GP12vipce_pu:4554: paramārthaś ca me prokto yathā jñānaṃ pradhānataḥ // ViP_2,13.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:4555: yat tu tad bhagavān āha bharatasya mahīpateḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4556: kathayiṣyāmi caritaṃ tan mamākhyātum arhasi // ViP_2,13.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4558: yogayuktaḥ samādhāya vāsudeve manaḥ sadā // ViP_2,13.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4560: kathaṃ tu nābhavan muktir yadābhūt sa dvijaḥ punaḥ // ViP_2,13.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4561: vipratve ca kṛtaṃ tena yad bhūyaḥ sumahātmanā /
GP12vipce_pu:4565: uvāsa suciraṃ kālaṃ maitreya pṛthivīpatiḥ // ViP_2,13.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4567: avāpa paramāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ manasaś cāpi saṃyame // ViP_2,13.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4569: kṛṣṇa viṣṇo hṛṣīkeśety āha rājā sa kevalam // ViP_2,13.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:4573: nānyaj jagāda maitreya kiṃcit svapnāntareṣv api /
GP12vipce_pu:4574: etat padaṃ tadarthaṃ ca vinā nānyad acintayat // ViP_2,13.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4576: nānyāni cakre karmāṇi niḥsaṅgo yogatāpasaḥ // ViP_2,13.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4578: sasnau tatra tadā cakre snānasyānantarakriyāḥ // ViP_2,13.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4579: athājagāma tat tīrthaṃ jalaṃ pātuṃ pipāsitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4580: āsannaprasavā brahmann ekaiva hariṇī vanāt // ViP_2,13.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4581: tataḥ samabhavat tatra pītaprāye jale tayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4583: tataḥ sā sahasā trāsād āplutā nimnagātaṭam /
GP12vipce_pu:4584: atyuccārohaṇenāsyā nadyāṃ garbhaḥ papāta saḥ // ViP_2,13.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4586: jagrāha sa nṛpo garbhāt patitaṃ mṛgapotakam // ViP_2,13.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4588: maitreya sāpi hariṇī papāta ca mamāra ca // ViP_2,13.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4590: mṛgapotaṃ samādāya punar āśramam āgataḥ // ViP_2,13.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4592: poṣaṇaṃ puṣyamāṇaś ca sa tena vavṛdhe mune // ViP_2,13.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:4594: dūraṃ gatvā ca śārdūlatrāsād abhyāyayau punaḥ // ViP_2,13.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4595: prātar gatvātidūraṃ ca sāyam āyāt tadāśramam /
GP12vipce_pu:4598: āsīc cetaḥ samāsaktaṃ na yayāv anyato dvija // ViP_2,13.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4600: mamatvaṃ sa cakāroccais tasmin hariṇabālake // ViP_2,13.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4601: kiṃ vṛkair bhakṣito vyāghraiḥ kiṃ siṃhena nipātitaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4602: cirāyamāṇe niṣkrānte tasyāsīd iti mānasam // ViP_2,13.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4608: kuśakāśā virājante baṭavaḥ sāmagā iva // ViP_2,13.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:4609: itthaṃ ciragate tasmin sa cakre mānasaṃ muniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4614: mṛgapote 'bhavac cittaṃ sthairyavat tasya bhūpateḥ // ViP_2,13.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:4615: kālena gacchatā so 'tha kālaṃ cakre mahīpatiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4616: piteva sāsraṃ putreṇa mṛgapotena vīkṣitaḥ // ViP_2,13.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:4617: mṛgam eṣa tadādrākṣīt tyajan prāṇān asāv api /
GP12vipce_pu:4618: tanmayatvena maitreya nānyat kiṃcid acintayat // ViP_2,13.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:4619: tataś ca tatkālakṛtāṃ bhāvanāṃ prāpya tādṛśīm /
GP12vipce_pu:4620: jambūmārge mahāraṇye jajñe jātismaro mṛgaḥ // ViP_2,13.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:4622: vihāya mātaraṃ bhūyaḥ sālagrāmam upāyayau // ViP_2,13.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:4623: śuṣkais tṛṇais tathā parṇaiḥ sa kurvann ātmapoṣaṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:4626: sadācāravatāṃ śuddhe yogināṃ pravare kule // ViP_2,13.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:4628: apaśyat sa ca maitreya ātmānaṃ prakṛteḥ param // ViP_2,13.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:4630: sarvabhūtāny abhedena dadarśa sa mahāmatiḥ // ViP_2,13.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:4632: na dadarśa ca karmāṇi śāstrāṇi jagṛhe na ca // ViP_2,13.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:4636: klinnadantāntaraḥ sarvaiḥ paribhūtaḥ sa nāgaraiḥ // ViP_2,13.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:4637: saṃmānanā parāṃ hāniṃ yogarddheḥ kurute yataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4638: janenāvamato yogī yogasiddhiṃ ca vindati // ViP_2,13.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:4639: tasmāc careta vai yogī satāṃ dharmam adūṣayan /
GP12vipce_pu:4640: janā yathāvamanyeran gaccheyur naiva saṃgatim // ViP_2,13.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:4642: ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa jaḍonmattākṛtiṃ jane // ViP_2,13.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:4644: yad yad āpnoti subahu tad atte kālasaṃyamam // ViP_2,13.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:4654: adhiṣṭhitaṃ mahākālī jñātvā yogeśvaraṃ tadā // ViP_2,13.48*12:3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4655: tataḥ khaḍgaṃ samādāya niśitaṃ niśi sā tadā // ViP_2,13.48*12:4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4659: viṣṭikartātha taṃ tatra viṣṭiyogyo 'yam ity api // ViP_2,13.48*12:8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4661: sa rājā śibikārūḍho gantuṃ kṛtamatir dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4663: śreyaḥ kim atra saṃsāre duḥkhaprāye nṛṇām iti /
GP12vipce_pu:4664: praṣṭuṃ taṃ mokṣadharmajñaṃ kapilākhyaṃ mahāmunim // ViP_2,13.50 //
GP12vipce_pu:4666: nṛṇāṃ viṣṭigṛhītānām anyeṣāṃ so 'pi madhyagaḥ // ViP_2,13.51 //
GP12vipce_pu:4668: jātismaro 'sau pāpasya kṣayakāma uvāha tām // ViP_2,13.52 //
GP12vipce_pu:4670: kurvan matimatāṃ śreṣṭhas te tv anye tvaritaṃ yayuḥ // ViP_2,13.53 //
GP12vipce_pu:4672: kim etad ity āha samaṃ gamyatāṃ śibikāvahāḥ // ViP_2,13.54 //
GP12vipce_pu:4673: punas tathaiva śibikāṃ vilokya viṣamāṃ hasan /
GP12vipce_pu:4674: nṛpaḥ kim etad ity āha bhavadbhir gamyate 'nyathā // ViP_2,13.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:4675: bhūpater vadatas tasya śrutvetthaṃ bahuśo vacaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4676: śibikodvāhakāḥ procur ayaṃ yātīty asatvaram // ViP_2,13.56 //
GP12vipce_pu:4678: kiṃ śrānto 'sy alpam adhvānaṃ tvayoḍhā śibikā mama /
GP12vipce_pu:4679: kim āyāsasaho na tvaṃ pīvān asi nirīkṣyase // ViP_2,13.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:4681: nāhaṃ pīvā na caivoḍhā śibikā bhavato mayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4682: na śrānto 'smi na cāyāsaḥ soḍhavyo 'sti mahīpate // ViP_2,13.58 //
GP12vipce_pu:4684: pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyase pīvān adyāpi śibikā tvayi /
GP12vipce_pu:4685: śramaś ca bhārodvahane bhavaty eva hi dehinām // ViP_2,13.59 //
GP12vipce_pu:4687: pratyakṣaṃ bhavatā bhūpa yad dṛṣṭaṃ mama tad vada /
GP12vipce_pu:4688: balavān abalaś ceti vācyaṃ paścād viśeṣaṇam // ViP_2,13.60 //
GP12vipce_pu:4689: tvayoḍhā śibikā ceti tvayy adyāpi ca saṃsthitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4690: mithyaitad atra tu bhavāñ śṛṇotu vacanaṃ mama // ViP_2,13.61 //
GP12vipce_pu:4694: skandhāśriteyaṃ śibikā mama bhāro 'tra kiṃ kṛtaḥ // ViP_2,13.63 //
GP12vipce_pu:4696: tatra tvam aham apy atra procyate cedam anyathā // ViP_2,13.64 //
GP12vipce_pu:4697: ahaṃ tvaṃ ca tathānye ca bhūtair uhyāma pārthiva /
GP12vipce_pu:4699: karmavaśyā guṇā hy ete sattvādyāḥ pṛthivīpate /
GP12vipce_pu:4700: avidyāsaṃcitaṃ karma tac cāśeṣeṣu jantuṣu // ViP_2,13.66 //
GP12vipce_pu:4701: ātmā śuddho 'kṣaraḥ śānto nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4703: yadā nopacayas tasya na caivāpacayo nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4704: tadā pīvān asītītthaṃ kayā yuktyā tvayeritam // ViP_2,13.68 //
GP12vipce_pu:4706: śibikeyaṃ yadā skandhe tadā bhāraḥ samas tvayā // ViP_2,13.69 //
GP12vipce_pu:4707: tathānyair jantubhir bhūpa śibikottho na kevalam /
GP12vipce_pu:4709: yadā puṃsaḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ prākṛtaiḥ kāraṇair nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4710: voḍhavyas tu tadā bhāraḥ katamo nṛpate mayā // ViP_2,13.71 //
GP12vipce_pu:4714: evam uktvābhavan maunī sa vahañ chibikāṃ dvijaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4715: so 'pi rājāvatīryorvyāṃ tatpādau jagṛhe tvaran // ViP_2,13.73 //
GP12vipce_pu:4717: bho bho visṛjya śibikāṃ prasādaṃ kuru me dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4718: kathyatāṃ ko bhavān atra jālmarūpadharaḥ sthitaḥ // ViP_2,13.74 //
GP12vipce_pu:4719: yo bhavān yan nimittaṃ vā yad āgamanakāraṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:4720: tat sarvaṃ kathyatāṃ vidvan mahyaṃ śuśrūṣave tvayā // ViP_2,13.75 //
GP12vipce_pu:4722: śrūyatāṃ ko 'ham ity etad vaktuṃ bhūpa na śakyate /
GP12vipce_pu:4725: dharmādharmodbhavau bhoktuṃ jantur dehādim ṛcchati // ViP_2,13.77 //
GP12vipce_pu:4726: sarvasyaiva hi bhūpāla jantoḥ sarvatra kāraṇam /
GP12vipce_pu:4727: dharmādharmau yatas tasmāt kāraṇaṃ pṛcchyate kutaḥ // ViP_2,13.78 //
GP12vipce_pu:4731: yat tv etad bhavatā proktaṃ ko 'ham ity etad ātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4732: vaktuṃ na śakyate śrotuṃ tan mamecchā pravartate // ViP_2,13.80 //
GP12vipce_pu:4733: yo 'sti so 'ham iti brahman kathaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GP12vipce_pu:4734: ātmany eva na doṣāya śabdo 'ham iti yo dvija // ViP_2,13.81 //
GP12vipce_pu:4736: śabdo 'ham iti doṣāya nātmany eṣa tathaiva tat /
GP12vipce_pu:4737: anātmany ātmavijñānaṃ śabdo vā bhrāntilakṣaṇaḥ // ViP_2,13.82 //
GP12vipce_pu:4738: jihvā bravīty aham iti dantauṣṭhau tālukaṃ nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4739: ete nāhaṃ yataḥ sarve vāṅniṣpādanahetavaḥ // ViP_2,13.83 //
GP12vipce_pu:4740: kiṃ hetubhir vadaty eṣā vāg evāham iti svayam /
GP12vipce_pu:4741: tathāpi vāṅ nāham etad vaktum itthaṃ na yujyate // ViP_2,13.84 //
GP12vipce_pu:4743: tato 'ham iti kutraitāṃ saṃjñāṃ rājan karomy aham // ViP_2,13.85 //
GP12vipce_pu:4744: yady anyo 'sti paraḥ ko 'pi mattaḥ pārthivasattama /
GP12vipce_pu:4745: tadaiṣo 'ham ayaṃ cānyo vaktum evam apīṣyate // ViP_2,13.86 //
GP12vipce_pu:4747: tadā hi ko bhavān ko 'ham ity etad viphalaṃ vacaḥ // ViP_2,13.87 //
GP12vipce_pu:4748: tvaṃ rājā śibikā ceyam vayaṃ vāhāḥ puraḥsarāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4749: ayaṃ ca bhavato loko na sad etan nṛpocyate // ViP_2,13.88 //
GP12vipce_pu:4750: vṛkṣād dāru tataś ceyaṃ śibikā tvadadhiṣṭhitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4751: kva vṛkṣasaṃjñā yātā syād dārusaṃjñātha vā nṛpa // ViP_2,13.89 //
GP12vipce_pu:4752: vṛkṣārūḍho mahārājo nāyaṃ vadati te janaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4753: na ca dāruṇi sarvas tvāṃ bravīti śibikāgatam // ViP_2,13.90 //
GP12vipce_pu:4755: anviṣyatāṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha tadbhede śibikā tvayā // ViP_2,13.91 //
GP12vipce_pu:4757: kva yātaṃ chatram ity eṣa nyāyas tvayi tathā mayi // ViP_2,13.92 //
GP12vipce_pu:4758: pumān strī gaur ayaṃ vājī kuñjaro vihagas taruḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4760: pumān na devo na naro na paśur na ca pādapaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4762: vastu rājeti yal loke yac ca rājabhaṭātmakam /
GP12vipce_pu:4763: tathānyac ca nṛpetthaṃ tan na satsaṃkalpanāmayam // ViP_2,13.95 //
GP12vipce_pu:4764: yat tu kālāntareṇāpi nānyasaṃjñām upaiti vai /
GP12vipce_pu:4765: pariṇāmādisaṃbhūtaṃ tad vastu nṛpa tac ca kim // ViP_2,13.96 //
GP12vipce_pu:4766: tvaṃ rājā sarvalokasya pituḥ putro ripo ripuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4767: patnyāḥ patiḥ pitā sūnoḥ kaṃ tvāṃ bhūpa vadāmy aham // ViP_2,13.97 //
GP12vipce_pu:4768: tvaṃ kim etac chiraḥ kiṃ nu śiras tava tathodaram /
GP12vipce_pu:4769: kim u pādādikaṃ tvaṃ vai tavaitat kiṃ mahīpate // ViP_2,13.98 //
GP12vipce_pu:4771: ko 'ham ity eva nipuṇo bhūtvā cintaya pārthiva // ViP_2,13.99 //
GP12vipce_pu:4772: evaṃ vyavasthite tattve mayāham iti bhāṣitum /
GP12vipce_pu:4778: praśrayāvanato bhūtvā tam āha nṛpatir dvijam // ViP_2,14.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4783: bhagavan yat tvayā proktaṃ paramārthamayaṃ vacaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4784: śrute tasmin bhramantīva manaso mama vṛttayaḥ // ViP_2,14.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:4786: bhavatā darśitaṃ vipra tat paraṃ prakṛter mahat // ViP_2,14.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:4787: nāhaṃ vahāmi śibikāṃ śibikā na mayi sthitā /
GP12vipce_pu:4788: śarīram anyad asmatto yeneyaṃ śibikā dhṛtā // ViP_2,14.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4790: pravartante guṇāś caite kiṃ mameti tvayoditam // ViP_2,14.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4792: mano vihvalatām eti paramārthārthitāṃ gatam // ViP_2,14.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4793: pūrvam eva mahābhāgaṃ kapilarṣim ahaṃ dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4794: praṣṭum abhyudyato gatvā śreyaḥ kiṃ nv ity asaṃśayam // ViP_2,14.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4795: tadantare ca bhavatā yad idaṃ vākyam īritam /
GP12vipce_pu:4796: tenaiva paramārthārthaṃ tvayi cetaḥ pradhāvati // ViP_2,14.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4799: sa eva bhagavān nūnam asmākaṃ hitakāmyayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4800: pratyakṣatām atra gato yathaitad bhavatocyate // ViP_2,14.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4801: tan mahyaṃ praṇatāya tvaṃ yac chreyaḥ paramaṃ dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4804: bhūpa pṛcchasi kiṃ śreyaḥ paramārthaṃ nu pṛcchasi /
GP12vipce_pu:4805: śreyāṃsy aparamārthāni aśeṣāṇy eva bhūpate // ViP_2,14.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4807: putrān icchati rājyaṃ ca śreyas tatprāptilakṣaṇam // ViP_2,14.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4809: śreyaḥ pradhānaṃ ca phale tad evānabhisaṃhite // ViP_2,14.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:4810: ātmā dhyeyaḥ sadā bhūpa yogayuktais tathā param /
GP12vipce_pu:4811: śreyas tasyaiva saṃyogaḥ śreyo yaḥ paramātmanaḥ // ViP_2,14.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4813: santy atra paramārthās tu na tv ete śrūyatāṃ ca me // ViP_2,14.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4814: dharmāya tyajyate kiṃ tu paramārtho dhanaṃ yadi /
GP12vipce_pu:4815: vyayaś ca kriyate kasmāt kāmaprāptyupalakṣaṇaḥ // ViP_2,14.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4816: putraś cet paramārthākhyaḥ so 'py anyasya nareśvara /
GP12vipce_pu:4817: paramārthabhūtaḥ so 'nyasya paramārtho hi tatpitā // ViP_2,14.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4818: evaṃ na paramārtho 'sti jagaty asmiṃś carācare /
GP12vipce_pu:4819: paramārtho hi kāryāṇi kāraṇānām aśeṣataḥ // ViP_2,14.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:4821: paramārthā bhavanty atra na bhavanti ca vai tataḥ // ViP_2,14.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4823: paramārthabhūtaṃ tatrāpi śrūyatāṃ gadato mama // ViP_2,14.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4824: yat tu niṣpādyate kāryaṃ mṛdā kāraṇabhūtayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4825: tat kāraṇānugamanāj jñāyate nṛpa mṛṇmayam // ViP_2,14.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4827: niṣpādyate kriyā yā tu sā bhavitrī vināśinī // ViP_2,14.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4829: tat tu nāśi na saṃdeho nāśidravyopapāditam // ViP_2,14.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4830: tad evāphaladaṃ karma paramārtho matas tava /
GP12vipce_pu:4833: bhedakāri parebhyas tat paramārtho na bhedavān // ViP_2,14.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:4835: mithyaitad anyadravyaṃ hi naiti taddravyatāṃ yataḥ // ViP_2,14.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:4836: tasmāc chreyāṃsy aśeṣāṇi nṛpaitāni na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4837: paramārthas tu bhūpāla saṃkṣepāc chrūyatāṃ mama // ViP_2,14.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:4838: eko vyāpī samaḥ śuddho nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4841: na yogavān na yukto 'bhūn naiva pārthiva yokṣyati // ViP_2,14.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:4845: abhedavyāpino vāyos tathā tasya mahātmanaḥ // ViP_2,14.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:4847: devādibhede 'padhvaste nāsty evāvaraṇo hi saḥ // ViP_2,14.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:4851: ity ukte mauninaṃ bhūyaś cintayānaṃ mahīpatim /
GP12vipce_pu:4854: śrūyatāṃ nṛpaśārdūla yad gītam ṛbhuṇā purā /
GP12vipce_pu:4859: pramāṇatarkataḥ samyak māne meye 'pi niścite // ViP_2,15.3*14 //
GP12vipce_pu:4861: prādād aśeṣavijñānaṃ sa tasmai parayā mudā // ViP_2,15.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4863: sa ṛbhus tarkayām āsa nidāghasya nareśvara // ViP_2,15.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4864: devikāyās taṭe vīranagaraṃ nāma vai puram /
GP12vipce_pu:4865: samṛddham atiramyaṃ ca pulastyena niveśitam // ViP_2,15.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4867: nidāgho nāma yogajña ṛbhuśiṣyo 'vasat purā // ViP_2,15.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:4868: divye varṣasahasre tu samatīte 'sya tat puram /
GP12vipce_pu:4869: jagāma sa ṛbhuḥ śiṣyaṃ nidāgham avalokitum // ViP_2,15.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:4873: uvāca sa dvijaśreṣṭho bhujyatām iti sādaram // ViP_2,15.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4875: bho vipravarya bhoktavyaṃ yad annaṃ bhavato gṛhe /
GP12vipce_pu:4876: tat kathyatāṃ kadanneṣu na prītiḥ satataṃ mama // ViP_2,15.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4879: yad rocate dvijaśreṣṭha tat tvaṃ bhuṅkṣva yathecchayā // ViP_2,15.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4881: kadannāni dvijaitāni miṣṭam annaṃ prayaccha me /
GP12vipce_pu:4884: he he śālini madgehe yat kiṃcid atiśobhanam /
GP12vipce_pu:4887: ity uktā tena sā patnī miṣṭam annaṃ dvijasya yat /
GP12vipce_pu:4888: prasādhitavatī tad vai bhartur vacanagauravāt // ViP_2,15.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4889: taṃ bhuktavantam icchāto miṣṭam annaṃ mahāmunim /
GP12vipce_pu:4890: nidāghaḥ prāha bhūpāla praśrayāvanataḥ sthitaḥ // ViP_2,15.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4892: api te paramā tṛptir utpannā tuṣṭir eva ca /
GP12vipce_pu:4893: api te mānasaṃ svastham āhāreṇa kṛtaṃ dvija // ViP_2,15.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4894: kvanivāso bhavān vipra kva ca gantuṃ samudyataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4895: āgamyate ca bhavatā yatas tac ca dvijocyatām // ViP_2,15.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:4897: kṣud yasya tasya bhukte 'nne tṛptir brāhmaṇa jāyate /
GP12vipce_pu:4898: na me kṣud abhavat tṛptiṃ kasmān māṃ paripṛcchasi // ViP_2,15.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:4900: bhavaty ambhasi ca kṣīṇe nṛṇāṃ tṛḍ api jāyate // ViP_2,15.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4901: kṣuttṛṣṇe dehadharmākhye na mamaite yato dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4902: tataḥ kṣutsaṃbhavābhāvāt tṛptir asty eva me sadā // ViP_2,15.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4903: manasaḥ svasthatā tuṣṭiś cittadharmāv imau dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4904: cetaso yasya tat pṛccha pumān ebhir na yujyate // ViP_2,15.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4905: kva nivāsas tavety uktaṃ kva gantāsi ca yat tvayā /
GP12vipce_pu:4906: kutaś cāgamyate tatra tritaye 'pi nibodha me // ViP_2,15.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4907: pumān sarvagato vyāpī ākāśavad ayaṃ yataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4908: kutaḥ kutra kva gantāsīty etad apy arthavat katham // ViP_2,15.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:4910: tvaṃ cānye ca na ca tvaṃ ca nānye naivāham apy aham // ViP_2,15.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:4911: mṛṣṭaṃ na mṛṣṭam ity eṣā jijñāsā me kṛtā tava /
GP12vipce_pu:4912: kiṃ vakṣyatīti tatrāpi śrūyatāṃ dvijasattama // ViP_2,15.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:4913: kim asvādv atha vā mṛṣṭaṃ bhuñjato 'nnaṃ dvijottama /
GP12vipce_pu:4914: mṛṣṭam eva yadāmṛṣṭaṃ tad evodvegakāraṇam // ViP_2,15.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:4915: amṛṣṭaṃ jāyate mṛṣṭaṃ mṛṣṭād udvijate janaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4917: mṛṇmayaṃ hi gṛhaṃ yadvan mṛdā liptaṃ sthiraṃ bhavet /
GP12vipce_pu:4918: pārthivo 'yaṃ tathā dehaḥ pārthivaiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ // ViP_2,15.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:4920: ālipta āpyāyayataḥ puṃso bhogo 'tra kiṃ kṛtaḥ // ViP_2,15.29*15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4922: guḍaṃ phalādīni tathā pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ // ViP_2,15.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:4923: tad etad bhavatā jñātvā mṛṣṭāmṛṣṭavicāri yat /
GP12vipce_pu:4924: tan manaḥ samatālambi kāryaṃ sāmyaṃ hi muktaye // ViP_2,15.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:4926: ity ākarṇya vacas tasya paramārthāśritaṃ nṛpa /
GP12vipce_pu:4927: praṇipatya mahābhāgo nidāgho vākyam abravīt // ViP_2,15.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:4928: prasīda maddhitārthāya kathyatāṃ yas tvam āgataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4929: naṣṭo mohas tavākarṇya vacāṃsy etāni me dvija // ViP_2,15.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:4931: ṛbhur asmi tavācāryaḥ prajñādānāya te dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:4933: evam ekam idaṃ viddhi na bhedi sakalaṃ jagat /
GP12vipce_pu:4937: pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyā icchātaḥ prayayāv ṛbhuḥ // ViP_2,15.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:4942: nidāghajñānadānāya tad eva nagaraṃ yayau // ViP_2,16.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:4943: nagarasya bahiḥ so 'tha nidāghaṃ dadṛśe muniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4947: dṛṣṭvā nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhur upagamyābhivādya ca /
GP12vipce_pu:4948: uvāca kasmād ekānte sthīyate bhavatā dvija // ViP_2,16.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:4950: bho vipra janasaṃmardo mahān eṣa nareśvare /
GP12vipce_pu:4951: pravivikṣau puraṃ ramyaṃ tenātra sthīyate mayā // ViP_2,16.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:4954: kathyatāṃ me dvijaśreṣṭha tvam abhijño mato mama // ViP_2,16.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:4959: etau hi gajarājānau yugapad darśitau mama /
GP12vipce_pu:4962: jñātum icchāmy ahaṃ ko 'tra gajaḥ ko vā narādhipaḥ // ViP_2,16.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:4964: gajo yo 'yam adho brahmann upary asyaiva bhūpatiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4965: vāhyavāhakasaṃbandhaṃ ko na jānāti vai dvija // ViP_2,16.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:4967: jānāmy ahaṃ yathā brahmaṃs tathā mām avabodhaya /
GP12vipce_pu:4968: adhaḥśabdanigadyaṃ kiṃ kiṃ cordhvam abhidhīyate // ViP_2,16.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:4970: ity uktaḥ sahasāruhya nidāghaḥ prāha tam ṛbhum /
GP12vipce_pu:4971: śrūyatāṃ kathayāmy eṣa yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi // ViP_2,16.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:4972: upary ahaṃ yathā rājā tvam adhaḥ kuñjaro yathā /
GP12vipce_pu:4973: avabodhāya te brahman dṛṣṭānto darśito mayā // ViP_2,16.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:4975: tvaṃ rājeva dvijaśreṣṭha sthito 'haṃ gajavad yadi /
GP12vipce_pu:4976: tad eva tvaṃ mamācakṣva katamas tvam ahaṃ tathā // ViP_2,16.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:4978: ity uktaḥ satvaras tasya pragṛhya caraṇāv ubhau /
GP12vipce_pu:4979: nidāghaḥ prāha bhagavān ācāryas tvam ṛbhur dhruvam // ViP_2,16.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:4981: yathācāryasya tena tvāṃ manye prāptam ahaṃ gurum // ViP_2,16.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:4984: gurus te 'ham ṛbhur nāmnā nidāgha samupāgataḥ // ViP_2,16.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:4985: tad etad upadiṣṭaṃ te saṃkṣepeṇa mahāmate /
GP12vipce_pu:4988: evam uktvā yayau vidvān nidāghaṃ sa ṛbhur guruḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:4991: tathā brahma tato muktim avāpa paramāṃ dvijaḥ // ViP_2,16.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:4993: bhava sarvagataṃ jānann ātmānam avanīpate // ViP_2,16.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:4995: bhrāntadṛṣṭibhir ātmāpi tathaikaḥ san pṛthak pṛthak // ViP_2,16.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:4996: ekaḥ samastaṃ yad ihāsti kiṃcit tad acyuto vāsti paraṃ tato 'nyat /
GP12vipce_pu:4997: so 'haṃ sa ca tvaṃ sa ca sarvam etad ātmasvarūpaṃ tyaja bhedamoham // ViP_2,16.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:4999: itīritas tena sa rājavaryas tatyāja bhedaṃ paramārthadṛṣṭiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5000: sa cāpi jātismaraṇāptabodhas tatraiva janmany apavargam āpa // ViP_2,16.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:5001: iti bharatanarendrasāravṛttaṃ kathayati yaś ca śṛṇoti bhaktiyuktaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5002: sa vimalamatir eti nātmamohaṃ bhavati ca saṃsaraṇeṣu muktiyogyaḥ // ViP_2,16.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:5007: sūryādīnāṃ ca saṃsthānaṃ jyotiṣām api vistarāt // ViP_3,1.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:5008: devādīnāṃ tathā sṛṣṭir ṛṣīṇāṃ cāpi varṇitā /

GP12vipce_pu:5013: bhavatā kathitān etāñ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ guro // ViP_3,1.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:5016: tāny ahaṃ bhavate samyak kathayāmi yathākramam // ViP_3,1.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:5017: svāyaṃbhuvo manuḥ pūrvaṃ manuḥ svārociṣas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5018: uttamas tāmasaś caiva raivataś cākṣuṣas tathā // ViP_3,1.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:5019: ṣaḍ ete manavo 'tītāḥ sāmprataṃ tu raveḥ sutaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5021: svāyaṃbhuvaṃ tu kathitaṃ kalpādāv antaraṃ mayā /
GP12vipce_pu:5022: devās tatrarṣayaś caiva yathāvat kathitā mayā // ViP_3,1.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:5023: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi manoḥ svārociṣasya tu /
GP12vipce_pu:5024: manvantarādhipān samyag devarṣīṃs tatsutāṃs tathā // ViP_3,1.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:5026: vipaścit tatra devendro maitreyāsīn mahābalaḥ // ViP_3,1.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:5027: ūrjaḥ stambhas tathā prāṇo dattolir ṛṣabhas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5028: niścaraś cārvarīvāṃś ca tatra saptarṣayo 'bhavan // ViP_3,1.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:5030: dvitīyam etat kathitam antaraṃ śṛṇu cottaram // ViP_3,1.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:5031: tṛtīye 'py antare brahmann uttamo nāma yo manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5032: suśāntir nāma devendro maitreyābhūt sureśvaraḥ // ViP_3,1.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:5033: sudhāmānas tathā satyāḥ śivāś cāsan pratardanāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5034: vaśavartinaś ca pañcaite gaṇā dvādaśakāḥ smṛtāḥ // ViP_3,1.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:5038: satyāś ca sudhiyaś caiva saptaviṃśatikā gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,1.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:5040: saptarṣayaś ca ye teṣāṃ tatra nāmāni me śṛṇu // ViP_3,1.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:5041: jyotirdhāmā pṛthuḥ kāvyaś caitro 'gnir vanakas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5042: pīvaraś carṣayo hy ete sapta tatrāpi cāntare // ViP_3,1.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:5044: putrās tu tāmasasyāsan rājānaḥ sumahābalāḥ // ViP_3,1.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:5045: pañcame cāpi maitreya raivato nāma nāmataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5046: manur vibhuś ca tatrendro devāṃś caivāntare śṛṇu // ViP_3,1.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:5048: ete devagaṇās tatra caturdaśa caturdaśa // ViP_3,1.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:5050: vedabāhuḥ sudhāmā ca parjanyaś ca mahāmuniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5051: ete saptarṣayo vipra tatrāsan raivate 'ntare // ViP_3,1.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:5054: svārociṣaś cottamaś ca tāmaso raivatas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5055: priyavratānvayā hy ete catvāro manavaḥ smṛtāḥ // ViP_3,1.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:5056: viṣṇum ārādhya tapasā sa rājarṣiḥ priyavrataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5058: ṣaṣṭhe manvantare cāsīc cākṣuṣākhyas tathā manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5059: manojavas tathaivendro devān api nibodha me // ViP_3,1.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:5060: āpyāḥ prasūtā bhavyāś ca pṛthugāś ca divaukasaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5061: mahānubhāvā lekhāś ca pañcaite hy aṣṭakā gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,1.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:5062: sumedhā virajāś caiva haviṣmān uttamo madhuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5063: atināmā sahiṣṇuś ca saptāsann iti carṣayaḥ // ViP_3,1.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:5067: manuḥ saṃvartate dhīmān sāmprataṃ saptame 'ntare // ViP_3,1.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:5072: ikṣvākuś ca nṛgaś caiva dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātir eva ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5073: nariṣyantaś ca vikhyāto nābhāgo diṣṭa eva ca // ViP_3,1.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:5074: karūṣaś ca pṛṣadhraś ca vasumāṃl lokaviśrutaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5075: manor vaivasvatasyaite nava putrāḥ sudhārmikāḥ // ViP_3,1.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:5079: ākūtyāṃ mānaso deva utpannaḥ prathame 'ntare // ViP_3,1.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:5080: tataḥ punaḥ sa vai devaḥ prāpte svārociṣe 'ntare /
GP12vipce_pu:5081: tuṣitāyāṃ samutpanno hy ajitas tuṣitaiḥ saha // ViP_3,1.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:5082: auttame hy antare cāpi tuṣitas tu punaḥ sa vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5083: satyāyām abhavat satyaḥ satyaiḥ saha surottamaiḥ // ViP_3,1.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:5084: tāmasasyāntare caiva saṃprāpte punar eva hi /
GP12vipce_pu:5085: haryāyāṃ haribhiḥ sārdhaṃ harir eva babhūva ha // ViP_3,1.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:5087: saṃbhūto rājasaiḥ sārdhaṃ devair devavaro hariḥ // ViP_3,1.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:5089: vikuṇṭhāyām asau jajñe vaikuṇṭhair daivataiḥ saha // ViP_3,1.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:5090: manvantare tu saṃprāpte tathā vaivasvate dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:5091: vāmanaḥ kaśyapād viṣṇur adityāṃ saṃbabhūva ha // ViP_3,1.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:5092: tribhiḥ kramair imāṃl lokāñ jitvā yena mahātmanā /
GP12vipce_pu:5094: ity etās tanavas tasya sapta manvantareṣu vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5095: saptasv evābhavan vipra yābhiḥ saṃrakṣitāḥ prajāḥ // ViP_3,1.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:5096: yasmād viṣṭam idaṃ sarvaṃ tasya śaktyā mahātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5097: tasmāt sa procyate viṣṇur viśer dhātoḥ praveśanāt // ViP_3,1.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:5098: sarve ca devā manavaḥ samastāḥ saptarṣayo ye manusūnavaś ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5099: indraś ca yo yas tridaśeśabhūto viṣṇor aśeṣās tu vibhūtayas tāḥ // ViP_3,1.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:5103: proktāny etāni bhavatā sapta manvantarāṇi vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5104: bhaviṣyāṇy api viprarṣe mamākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi // ViP_3,2.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:5107: manur yamo yamī caiva tadapatyāni vai mune // ViP_3,2.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:5108: asahantī tu sā bhartus tejaś chāyāṃ yuyoja vai /
GP12vipce_pu:5109: bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇe 'raṇyaṃ svayaṃ ca tapase yayau // ViP_3,2.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:5110: saṃjñeyam ity athārkaś ca chāyāyām ātmajatrayam /
GP12vipce_pu:5111: śanaiścaraṃ manuṃ cānyaṃ tapatīṃ cāpy ajījanat // ViP_3,2.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:5112: chāyāsaṃjñā dadau śāpaṃ yamāya kupitā yadā /
GP12vipce_pu:5113: tadānyeyam asau buddhir ity āsīd yamasūryayoḥ // ViP_3,2.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:5115: samādhidṛṣṭyā dadṛśe tām aśvāṃ tapasi sthitām // ViP_3,2.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:5117: janayām āsa revantaṃ retaso 'nte ca bhāskaraḥ // ViP_3,2.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:5118: āninye ca punaḥ saṃjñāṃ svasthānaṃ bhagavān raviḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5119: tejasaḥ śamanaṃ cāsya viśvakarmā cakāra ha // ViP_3,2.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:5120: bhramam āropya sūryaṃ tu tasya tejoviśātanam /
GP12vipce_pu:5121: kṛtavān aṣṭamaṃ bhāgaṃ na vyaśātayatāvyayam // ViP_3,2.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:5122: yat sūryād vaiṣṇavaṃ tejaḥ śātitaṃ viśvakarmaṇā /
GP12vipce_pu:5123: jājvalyamānam apatat tad bhūmau munisattama // ViP_3,2.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:5124: tvaṣṭaiva tejasā tena viṣṇoś cakram akalpayat /
GP12vipce_pu:5125: triśūlaṃ caiva śarvasya śibikāṃ dhanadasya ca // ViP_3,2.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:5126: śaktiṃ guhasya devānām anyeṣāṃ ca yad āyudham /
GP12vipce_pu:5127: tat sarvaṃ tejasā tena viśvakarmā vyavardhayat // ViP_3,2.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:5129: pūrvajasya savarṇo 'sau sāvarṇis tena kathyate // ViP_3,2.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:5130: tasya manvantaraṃ hy etat sāvarṇikam athāṣṭamam /
GP12vipce_pu:5131: tac chṛṇuṣva mahābhāga bhaviṣyaṃ kathayāmi te // ViP_3,2.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:5132: sāvarṇis tu manur yo 'sau maitreya bhavitā tataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5133: sutapāś cāmitābhāś ca mukhyāś cāpi tadā surāḥ // ViP_3,2.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:5134: teṣāṃ gaṇas tu devānām ekaiko viṃśakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5135: saptarṣīn api vakṣyāmi bhaviṣyān munisattama // ViP_3,2.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:5136: dīptimān gālavo rāmaḥ kṛpo drauṇis tathāparaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5137: matputraś ca tathā vyāsa ṛśyaśṛṅgaś ca saptamaḥ // ViP_3,2.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:5139: virocanasutas teṣāṃ balir indro bhaviṣyati // ViP_3,2.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:5141: sāvarṇes tu manoḥ putrā bhaviṣyanti nareśvarāḥ // ViP_3,2.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:5142: navamo dakṣasāvarṇir maitreya bhavitā manuḥ // ViP_3,2.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:5143: pārā marīcigarbhāś ca sudharmāṇas tathā tridhā /
GP12vipce_pu:5144: bhaviṣyanti tadā devā ekaiko dvādaśo gaṇaḥ // ViP_3,2.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:5145: teṣām indro mahāvīryo bhaviṣyaty adbhuto dvija // ViP_3,2.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:5146: savano dyutimān bhavyo vasur medhātithis tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5147: jyotiṣmān saptamaḥ satyas tatraite ca maharṣayaḥ // ViP_3,2.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:5151: sudhāmāno viruddhāś ca śatasaṃkhyās tathā surāḥ // ViP_3,2.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:5152: teṣām indraś ca bhavitā śāntir nāma mahābalaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5153: saptarṣayo bhaviṣyanti ye tadā tāñ chṛṇuṣva ca // ViP_3,2.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:5154: haviṣmān sukṛtiḥ satyo hy apāṃmūrtis tathāparaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5155: nābhāgo 'pratimaujāś ca satyaketus tathaiva ca // ViP_3,2.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:5158: ekādaśaś ca bhavitā dharmasāvarṇiko manuḥ // ViP_3,2.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:5160: gaṇās tv ete tadā mukhyā devānāṃ ca bhaviṣyatām /
GP12vipce_pu:5161: ekaikas triṃśakas teṣāṃ gaṇaś cendraś ca vai vṛṣaḥ // ViP_3,2.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:5162: niścaraś cāgnitejāś ca vapuṣmān viṣṇur āruṇiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5163: haviṣmān anaghaś caite bhavyāḥ saptarṣayas tathā // ViP_3,2.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:5165: bhaviṣyanti manos tasya tanayāḥ pṛthivīśvarāḥ // ViP_3,2.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:5166: rudraputras tu sāvarṇir bhavitā dvādaśo manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5167: ṛtadhāmā ca tatrendro bhavitā śṛṇu me surān // ViP_3,2.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:5168: haritā lohitā devās tathā sumanaso dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:5169: sukarmāṇaḥ supārāś ca daśakāḥ pañca vai gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,2.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:5171: tapodhṛtir dyutiś cānyaḥ saptamas tu tapodhanaḥ // ViP_3,2.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:5173: manos tasya mahāvīryā bhaviṣyanti sutā nṛpāḥ // ViP_3,2.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:5174: trayodaśo raucyanāmā bhaviṣyati mune manuḥ // ViP_3,2.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:5176: trayas triṃśadvibhedās te devānāṃ ye tu vai gaṇāḥ // ViP_3,2.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:5177: divaspatir mahāvīryas teṣām indro bhaviṣyati // ViP_3,2.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:5179: dhṛtimān avyayaś cānyaḥ saptamaḥ sutapā muniḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5180: saptarṣayas tv ime tasya putrān api nibodha me // ViP_3,2.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:5182: bhautyaś caturdaśaś cātra maitreya bhavitā manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5183: śucir indraḥ suragaṇās tatra pañca śṛṇuṣva tān // ViP_3,2.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:5184: cākṣuṣāś ca pavitrāś ca kaniṣṭhā bhrājirās tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5185: vācāvṛddhāś ca vai devāḥ saptarṣīn api me śṛṇu // ViP_3,2.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:5186: agnibāhuḥ śuciḥ śukro māgadho 'gnīdhra eva ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5187: yuktas tathā jitaś cānyo manuputrān ataḥ śṛṇu // ViP_3,2.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:5189: kathitā muniśārdūla pālayiṣyanti ye mahīm // ViP_3,2.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:5191: pravartayanti tān etya bhuvi saptarṣayo divaḥ // ViP_3,2.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:5192: kṛte kṛte smṛter vipra praṇetā jāyate manuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5193: devā yajñabhujas te tu yāvan manvantaraṃ tu tat // ViP_3,2.47 //
GP12vipce_pu:5194: bhavanti ye manoḥ putrā yāvan manvantaraṃ tu taiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5195: tadanvayodbhavaiś caiva tāvad bhūḥ paripālyate // ViP_3,2.48 //
GP12vipce_pu:5196: manuḥ saptarṣayo devā bhūpālāś ca manoḥ sutāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5197: manvantare bhavanty ete śakraś caivādhikāriṇaḥ // ViP_3,2.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:5198: caturdaśabhir etais tu gatair manvantarair dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:5200: tāvatpramāṇā ca niśā tato bhavati sattama /
GP12vipce_pu:5202: trailokyam akhilaṃ grastvā bhagavān ādikṛd vibhuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5204: tataḥ prabuddho bhagavān yathā pūrvaṃ tathā punaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5205: sṛṣṭiṃ karoty avyayātmā kalpe kalpe rajoguṇaḥ // ViP_3,2.53 //
GP12vipce_pu:5206: manavo bhūbhujaḥ sendrā devāḥ saptarṣayas tathā /
GP12vipce_pu:5209: yugavyavasthāṃ kurute yathā maitreya tac chṛṇu // ViP_3,2.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:5213: duṣṭānāṃ nigrahaṃ kurvan paripāti jagattrayam // ViP_3,2.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:5214: vedam ekaṃ caturbhedaṃ kṛtvā śākhāśatair vibhuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5216: vedāṃs tu dvāpare vyasya kaler ante punar hariḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5217: kalkisvarūpī durvṛttān mārge sthāpayati prabhuḥ // ViP_3,2.59 //
GP12vipce_pu:5218: evam eṣa jagat sarvaṃ paripāti karoti ca /
GP12vipce_pu:5219: hanti cānteṣv anantātmā nāsty asmād vyatireki yat // ViP_3,2.60 //
GP12vipce_pu:5220: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca sarvabhūtān mahātmanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:5221: tad atrānyatra vā vipra sadbhāvaḥ kathitas tava // ViP_3,2.61 //
GP12vipce_pu:5223: manvantarādhipāṃś caiva kim anyat kathayāmi te // ViP_3,2.62 //
GP12vipce_pu:5227: jñātam etan mayā tvatto yathā sarvam idaṃ jagat /

GP12vipce_pu:6895: tatpitrā tu vasiṣṭhavacanāt pratiṣṭhānaṃ nāma nagaraṃ sudyumnāya dattaṃ tac cāsau purūravase prādāt // ViP_4,1.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:6896: pṛṣadhras tu manoḥ putro gurugovadhāc chūdratvam agamat // ViP_4,1.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:6897: karūṣāt kārūṣāḥ kṣatriyā mahābalaparākramā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,1.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:6903: tataś ca khanitras tasmāc cakṣupaḥ cakṣupāc cātibalaparākramo viṃśo 'bhavat // ViP_4,1.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:6904: tato viviṃśas tasmāc ca khaninetras tataś cātivibhūtiḥ // ViP_4,1.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:6905: ativibhūter bhūribalaparākramaḥ karaṃdhamaḥ putro 'bhavat tasmād apy avikṣir avikṣer apy atibalaḥ putro marutto 'bhavad yasyemāv adyāpi ślokau gīyete // ViP_4,1.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:6906: maruttasya yathā yajñas tathā kasyābhavad bhuvi /
GP12vipce_pu:6907: sarvaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ yasya yajñavastv atiśobhanam // ViP_4,1.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:6909: marutaḥ pariveṣṭāraḥ sadasyāś ca divaukasaḥ // ViP_4,1.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:6910: maruttaś cakravartī nariṣyantanāmānaṃ putram avāpa // ViP_4,1.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:6911: tasmāc ca damo damasya putro rājyavardhano jajñe // ViP_4,1.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:6912: rājyavardhanāt sudhṛtir abhūt tataś ca naras tasmāc ca kevalaḥ kevalād bandhumān bandhumato vegavān vegavato budhaś tataś ca tṛṇabinduḥ // ViP_4,1.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:6913: tasyāpy ekā kanyā ilavilā nāma // ViP_4,1.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:6914: taṃ cālambuṣā nāma varāpsarās tṛṇabinduṃ bheje // ViP_4,1.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:6915: tasyām asya viśālo jajñe yaḥ purīṃ vaiśālīṃ nāma nirmame // ViP_4,1.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:6917: tasmāc ca sucandras tattanayo dhūmrāśvas tasyāpi sṛñjayo 'bhūt // ViP_4,1.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:6920: somadattaḥ kṛśāśvāj jajñe yo daśāśvamedhān ājahāra // ViP_4,1.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:6927: śaryāteḥ kanyā sukanyā nāmābhavad yām upayeme cyavanaḥ // ViP_4,1.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:6928: ānartaś ca nāma dhārmikaḥ śaryātiputro 'bhūt // ViP_4,1.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:6929: ānartasyāpi revato nāma putro jajñe yo 'sāv ānartaviṣayaṃ bubhuje purīṃ ca kuśasthalīm adhyuvāsa // ViP_4,1.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:6930: revatasyāpi raivataḥ putraḥ kakudmī nāma dharmātmā bhrātṛśatasya jyeṣṭho 'bhavat // ViP_4,1.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:6932: tām ādāya kasyeyam arhatīti bhagavantam abjayoniṃ praṣṭuṃ brahmalokaṃ jagāma // ViP_4,1.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:6933: tāvac ca brahmaṇo 'ntike hāhāhūhūsaṃjñābhyāṃ gandharvābhyām atitānaṃ nāma divyaṃ gāndharvam agīyata // ViP_4,1.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:6934: tāvac ca trimārgaparivartair anekayugaparivṛttitiṣṭhann api raivataḥ śṛṇvan muhūrtam iva mene // ViP_4,1.47 //
GP12vipce_pu:6935: gītāvasāne ca bhagavantam abjayoniṃ praṇamya raivataḥ kanyāyogyaṃ varam apṛcchat // ViP_4,1.48 //
GP12vipce_pu:6936: taṃ cāha bhagavān kathaya yo 'bhimatas te vara iti // ViP_4,1.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:6937: punaś ca praṇamya bhagavate tasmai yathābhimatān ātmanaḥ sa varān kathayām āsa /
GP12vipce_pu:6938: ka eṣāṃ bhagavato 'bhimato yasmai kanyām imāṃ prayacchāmīti // ViP_4,1.50 //
GP12vipce_pu:6939: tataḥ kiṃcidavanataśirāḥ sasmitaṃ bhagavān abjayonir āha // ViP_4,1.51 //
GP12vipce_pu:6940: ya ete bhavato 'bhimatā naiteṣāṃ sāmpratam apatyāpatyasaṃtatir apy avanītale 'sti // ViP_4,1.52 //
GP12vipce_pu:6941: bahūni hi tavātraiva gāndharvaṃ śṛṇvataś caturyugāny atītāni // ViP_4,1.53 //
GP12vipce_pu:6942: sāmprataṃ hi bhūtale 'ṣṭāviṃśatitamasya manoś caturyugam atītaprāyam āsanno hi tatra kaliḥ // ViP_4,1.54 //
GP12vipce_pu:6943: anyasmai kanyāratnam idaṃ bhavataikākinā deyam // ViP_4,1.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:6945: tataḥ punar utpannasādhvasaḥ sa rājā bhagavantaṃ praṇamya papraccha // ViP_4,1.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:6946: bhagavann evam avasthite mayeyaṃ kasmai deyeti // ViP_4,1.58 //
GP12vipce_pu:6947: tataḥ sa bhagavān kiṃcidavanamrakandharaṃ kṛtāñjalibhūtaṃ sarvalokagurur abjayonir āha // ViP_4,1.59 //
GP12vipce_pu:6949: na hy ādimadhyāntam ajasya yasya vidmo vayaṃ sarvamayasya dhātuḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:6951: kalāmuhūrtādimayaś ca kālo na yadvibhūteḥ pariṇāmahetuḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:6955: madrūpam āsthāya sṛjaty ajo yaḥ sthitau ca yo 'sau puruṣasvarūpī /

GP12vipce_pu:6957: śakrādirūpī paripāti viśvam arkendurūpaś ca tamo hinasti /

GP12vipce_pu:6959: ceṣṭāṃ karoti śvasanasvarūpī lokasya tṛptiṃ ca jalānnarūpī /

GP12vipce_pu:6961: yaḥ sṛjyate sargakṛd ātmanaiva yaḥ pālyate pālayitā ca devaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:6963: yasmiñ jagad yo jagad etad ādyo yaś cāśrito 'smiñ jagati svayaṃbhūḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:6964: sa sarvabhūtaprabhavo dharitryāṃ svāṃśena viṣṇur nṛpate 'vatīrṇaḥ // ViP_4,1.67 //
GP12vipce_pu:6965: kuśasthalī yā tava bhūpa ramyā purī purābhūd amarāvatīva /

GP12vipce_pu:6967: tasmai tvam enāṃ tanayāṃ narendra prayaccha māyāmanujāya jāyām /

GP12vipce_pu:6970: itīrito 'sau kamalodbhavena bhuvaṃ samāsādya patiḥ prajānām /

GP12vipce_pu:6972: kuśasthalīṃ tāṃ ca purīm upetya dṛṣṭvānyarūpāṃ pradadau svakanyām /
GP12vipce_pu:6974: uccapramāṇām iti tām avekṣya svalāṅgalāgreṇa sa tālaketuḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:6977: dattvā ca kanyāṃ sa nṛpo jagāma himālayaṃ vai tapase dhṛtātmā // ViP_4,1.73 //
GP12vipce_pu:6981: yāvac ca brahmalokāt kakudmī raivato nābhyeti tāvat puṇyajanasaṃjñā rākṣasās tām asya purīṃ kuśasthalīṃ jaghnuḥ // ViP_4,2.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:6982: tac cāsya bhrātṛśataṃ puṇyajanatrāsād diśo bheje // ViP_4,2.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:6983: tadanvayāś ca kṣatriyāḥ sarvadikṣv abhavan // ViP_4,2.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:6988: virūpāt pṛṣadaśvo jajñe tataś ca rathītaraḥ // ViP_4,2.6 //
GP12vipce_pu:6990: ete kṣatraprasūtā vai punaś cāṅgirasāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:6992: kṣuvataś ca manor ikṣvākur ghrāṇataḥ putro jajñe // ViP_4,2.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:6996: sa cekṣvākur aṣṭakāyām utpādya śrāddhārhaṃ māṃsam ānayeti vikukṣim ājñāpayām āsa /
GP12vipce_pu:6997: sa tatheti gṛhītājño vanam abhyetyānekān mṛgān hatvātiśrānto 'tikṣutparīto vikukṣir ekaṃ śaśam abhakṣayat /
GP12vipce_pu:6998: śeṣaṃ ca māṃsam ānīya pitre nivedayām āsa // ViP_4,2.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:7000: alam anenāmedhyenāmiṣeṇa durātmanānena te putreṇaitan māṃsam upahataṃ yato 'nena śaśo bhakṣitaḥ // ViP_4,2.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:7001: tataś cāsau vikukṣir guruṇaivam uktaḥ śaśādasaṃjñām avāpa pitrā ca parityaktaḥ // ViP_4,2.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:7002: pitary uparate cākhilām etāṃ pṛthvīṃ dharmataḥ śaśāsa // ViP_4,2.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:7004: idaṃ cānyat purā hi tretāyāṃ devāsuram atīva bhīṣaṇaṃ yuddham āsīt /
GP12vipce_pu:7005: tatra cātibalibhir asurair amarāḥ parājitā bhagavantaṃ viṣṇum ārādhayāṃ cakruḥ // ViP_4,2.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:7006: prasannaś ca devānām anādinidhanaḥ sakalajagatparāyaṇo nārāyaṇaḥ prāha /

GP12vipce_pu:7008_0: puraṃjayo nāma śaśādasya ca rājarṣes tanayaḥ kṣatriyavaryas taccharīre 'ham aṃśena
GP12vipce_pu:7008_1: svayam evāvatīrya tān aśeṣān asurān nihaniṣyāmi tad bhavadbhiḥ puraṃjayo 'suravadhārthāya
GP12vipce_pu:7008_2: kāryodyogaḥ kārya iti etac ca śrutvā praṇamya bhagavantaṃ viṣṇum amarāḥ puraṃjayasakāśam
GP12vipce_pu:7010: bho bhoḥ kṣatriyavaryāsmābhir abhyarthitena bhavatāsmākam arātivadhodyatānāṃ sāhāyyaṃ kṛtam icchāmaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7011: tad bhavatāsmākam abhyāgatānāṃ praṇayabhaṅgo na kāryaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7013: sakalatrailokyanātho yo 'yaṃ yuṣmākam indraḥ śatakratur asya yady ahaṃ skandhārūḍho yuṣmadarātibhiḥ saha yotsye tadāhaṃ bhavatāṃ sahāyaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7014: ity ākarṇya samastadevair indreṇa ca bāḍham ity evaṃ samanvicchitam // ViP_4,2.17 //
GP12vipce_pu:7015: tataś ca śatakrator vṛṣabharūpadhāriṇaḥ kakutstho 'tiharṣasamanvito bhagavataś carācaraguror acyutasya tejasāpyāyito devāsurasaṃgrāme samastān evāsurān nijaghāna // ViP_4,2.18 //
GP12vipce_pu:7016: yataś ca vṛṣabhakakutsthena rājñā niṣūditam asurabalam ataś cāsau kakutsthasaṃjñām avāpa // ViP_4,2.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:7017_0: kakutsthasyāpy anenāḥ putro 'bhūt pṛthur anenasaḥ pṛthor viśvagaśvas tasyāpi cāndro
GP12vipce_pu:7017_1: yuvanāśvaś cāndrasya tasya yuvanāśvasya śrāvasto yaḥ purīṃ śrāvastīṃ niveśayām āsa // ViP_4,2.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:7018_0: śrāvastasya bṛhadaśvas tasyāpi kuvalayāśvo yo 'sāv uttaṅkasya maharṣer apakāriṇaṃ
GP12vipce_pu:7018_1: dhundhunāmānam asuraṃ vaiṣṇavena tejasāpyāyitaḥ putrasahasrair ekaviṃśatibhiḥ parivṛto
GP12vipce_pu:7019: tasya ca samastā eva putrā dhundhumukhaniḥśvāsāgninā vipluṣṭā vineśuḥ // ViP_4,2.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:7021: dṛḍhāśvād dharyaśvas tasmān nikumbho nikumbhāt saṃhitāśvaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7023: tasmāc ca prasenajit tato yuvanāśvo 'bhavat // ViP_4,2.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:7024: tasya cāputrasyātinirvedān munīnām āśramamaṇḍale nivasataḥ kṛpālubhis tair munibhir apatyotpādanāya iṣṭiḥ kṛtā /
GP12vipce_pu:7025: tasyāṃ ca madhyarātrinivṛttāyāṃ mantrapūtajalapūrṇaṃ kalaśaṃ vedimadhye niveśya te munayaḥ suṣupuḥ // ViP_4,2.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:7026: teṣu ca supteṣv atitṛṭparītaḥ sa bhūpālas tam āśramaṃ viveśa // ViP_4,2.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:7027: suptāṃś ca tān ṛṣīn naivotthāpayām āsa /
GP12vipce_pu:7028: tac ca kalaśajalam aparimeyamāhātmyaṃ mantrapūtaṃ papau // ViP_4,2.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:7029: prabuddhāś ca ṛṣayaḥ papracchuḥ kenaitan mantrapūtaṃ vāri pītam // ViP_4,2.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:7030: atra hi pīte rājño yuvanāśvasya patnī mahābalaparākramaṃ putraṃ janayiṣyatīty ākarṇya sa rājā ajānatā mayā pītam ity āha // ViP_4,2.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:7031: garbhaś ca yuvanāśvasyodare 'bhavat krameṇa ca vavṛdhe // ViP_4,2.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:7032: prāptasamayaś ca dakṣiṇakukṣim avanīpater nirbhidya niścakrāma na cāsau rājā mamāra // ViP_4,2.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:7033: jāto nāmaiṣa kaṃ dhāsyatīti munayaḥ procuḥ // ViP_4,2.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:7034: athāgamya devarāḍ abravīt mām ayaṃ dhāsyatīti // ViP_4,2.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:7036: vaktre cāsya pradeśinī devarājena nyastā tāṃ papau /
GP12vipce_pu:7037: tāṃ cāmṛtasrāviṇīm āsvādyāhnaiva sa vyavardhata // ViP_4,2.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:7038: sa tu māṃdhātā cakravartī saptadvīpāṃ mahīṃ bubhuje // ViP_4,2.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:7040: yāvat sūrya udeti sma yāvac ca pratitiṣṭhati /
GP12vipce_pu:7041: sarvaṃ tad yauvanāśvasya māṃdhātuḥ kṣetram ucyate // ViP_4,2.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:7043: purukutsam ambarīṣaṃ ca mucakundaṃ ca tasyāṃ putratrayam utpādayām āsa // ViP_4,2.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:7044: pañcāśac ca duhitaras tasya nṛpater babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,2.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:7045: bahvṛcaś ca saubharir nāma ṛṣir antarjale dvādaśābdaṃ kālam uvāsa // ViP_4,2.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:7046: tatra cāntarjale saṃmado nāmātibahuprajo 'tipramāṇo mīnādhipatir āsīt /
GP12vipce_pu:7047: tasya ca putrapautradauhitrāḥ pārśvataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'grato vakṣaḥpucchaśirasāṃ copari bhramantas tenaiva sahāharniśam atinirvṛtā remire // ViP_4,2.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:7048: sa cāpi tatsparśopacīyamānaharṣaprakarṣo bahuprakāraṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ paśyatas tair ātmajapautradauhitrādibhiḥ sahānudinaṃ bahuprakāraṃ reme // ViP_4,2.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:7049: athāntarjalāvasthitaḥ sa saubharir ekāgratāsamādhānam apahāyānudinaṃ tat tasya matsyasyātmajapautradauhitrādibhiḥ sahātiramaṇīyaṃ lalitam avekṣyācintayat /
GP12vipce_pu:7050: aho dhanyo 'yam īdṛśam apy anabhimataṃ yonyantaram avāpyaibhir ātmajapautrādibhiḥ saha ramamāṇo 'tīvāsmākaṃ spṛhām utpādayati /
GP12vipce_pu:7051: vayam apy evaṃ putrādibhiḥ saha ramiṣyāmaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7052: ity evam abhisamīkṣya sa tasmād antarjalān niṣkramya nirveṣṭukāmaḥ kanyārthaṃ māṃdhātāraṃ rājānam agacchat // ViP_4,2.42 //
GP12vipce_pu:7053: āgamanaśravaṇasamanantaraṃ cotthāya tena rājñā samyag arghādinā pūjitaḥ kṛtāsanaparigrahaḥ saubharir uvāca // ViP_4,2.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:7055: nirveṣṭukāmo 'smi narendra kanyāṃ prayaccha me mā praṇayaṃ vibhāṅkṣīḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7056: na hy arthinaḥ kāryavaśābhyupetāḥ kakutsthagotre vimukhāḥ prayānti // ViP_4,2.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:7057: anye 'pi santy eva nṛpāḥ pṛthivyāṃ kṣmāpāla yeṣāṃtanayāḥ prasūtāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7058: kiṃtv arthinām arthitadānadīkṣā kṛtavrataṃ ślāghyam idaṃ kulaṃ te // ViP_4,2.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:7059: śatārdhasaṃkhyās tava santi kanyās tāsāṃ mamaikāṃ nṛpate prayaccha /
GP12vipce_pu:7060: yat prārthanābhaṅgabhayād bibhemi tasmād ahaṃ rājavarātiduḥkhāt // ViP_4,2.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:7062: iti ṛṣivacanam ākarṇya sa rājā jarājarjaritadehaṃ tam ṛṣim ālokya pratyākhyānakātaras tasmāc ca bhagavataḥ śāpato bibhyatkiṃcidadhomukhaś ciraṃ dadhyau // ViP_4,2.47 //
GP12vipce_pu:7064: narendra kasmāt samupaiṣi cintām aśakyam uktaṃ na mayātra kiṃcit /
GP12vipce_pu:7065: yāvaśyadeyā tanayā tayaiva kṛtārthatā no yadi kiṃ na labdham // ViP_4,2.48 //
GP12vipce_pu:7067: atha tasya śāpabhītaḥ sapraśrayam uvācāsau rājā // ViP_4,2.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:7069: bhagavann asmatkulasthitir iyaṃ ya eva kanyāyā abhirucito 'bhijanavān varas tasmai kanyā pradīyate /

GP12vipce_pu:7747: sa ca praṇipatyainaṃ punar api prasādya jāmbavatīṃ nāma kanyāṃ gṛhāgamanārghyabhūtāṃ grāhayām āsa // ViP_4,13.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:7748: syamantakamaṇim apy asau praṇipatya tasmai pradadau /

GP12vipce_pu:7751: bhagavadāgamanodbhūtaharṣotkarṣasya dvārakāvāsijanasya kṛṣṇāvalokanāt tatkṣaṇam evātipariṇatavayaso 'pi navayauvanam ivābhavat /
GP12vipce_pu:7752: ānakadundubhiṃ ca diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti sakalayādavāḥ striyaś ca sabhājayām āsuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7753: bhagavān api yathānubhūtam aśeṣayādavasamāje yathāvad ācacakṣe /
GP12vipce_pu:7754: syamantakaṃ ca satrājitāya dattvā mithyābhiśastiviśuddhim avāpa // ViP_4,13.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:7756: satrājito 'pi mayāsyābhūtamalinam āropitam iti jātasaṃtrāsaḥ svasutāṃ satyabhāmāṃ bhagavate bhāryāṃ dadau /
GP12vipce_pu:7757: tāṃ cākrūrakṛtavarmaśatadhanvapramukhā yādavāḥ pūrvaṃ varayāṃ āsuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7758: tatas tatpradānād avajñātam ivātmānaṃ manyamānāḥ satrājite vairānubandhaṃ cakruḥ // ViP_4,13.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:7760: ayam atidurātmā satrājito yo 'smābhir bhavatā ca abhyarthito 'py ātmajām asmān bhavantaṃ cāvigaṇayya kṛṣṇāya dattavān /
GP12vipce_pu:7761: tad alam anena jīvatā ghātayitvainaṃ tan mahāratnaṃ tvayā kiṃ na gṛhyate /
GP12vipce_pu:7762: vayam abhyupapatsyāmo yady acyutas tavopari vairānubandhaṃ kariṣyatīti // ViP_4,13.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:7763: evam uktas tathety asāv apy āha /
GP12vipce_pu:7764: jatugṛhadagdhānāṃ pāṇḍutanayānāṃ viditaparamārtho 'pi bhagavān duryodhanaprayatnaśaithilyakaraṇārtham ānukūlyakaraṇāya vāraṇāvataṃ gataḥ // ViP_4,13.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:7765: gate ca tasmin suptam eva satrājitaṃ śatadhanvā jaghāna maṇiratnaṃ cādade /
GP12vipce_pu:7766: pitṛvadhāmarṣapūrṇā ca satyabhāmā śīghraṃ syandanam ārūḍhā vāraṇāvataṃ gatvā bhagavate 'haṃ pratipāditety akṣāntimatā śatadhanvanāsmatpitā vyāpāditaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7769: tad ālocya yad atra yuktaṃ tat kriyatām iti kṛṣṇam āha // ViP_4,13.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:7770: tayā caivam uktaḥ parituṣṭāntaḥkaraṇo 'pi kṛṣṇaḥ satyabhāmām amarṣatāmralocanaḥ prāha /
GP12vipce_pu:7773: na hy anullaṅghya varapādapaṃ tatkṛtanīḍāśrayiṇo vihaṃgā vadhyante /
GP12vipce_pu:7774: tad alam atyartham amunāsmatpurataḥ śokapreritavākyaparikareṇety uktvā dvārakām abhyetya baladevam ekānte vāsudevaḥ prāha /
GP12vipce_pu:7777: tadubhayavināśāt tan maṇiratnam āvābhyāṃ sāmānyaṃ bhaviṣyati // ViP_4,13.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:7778: tad uttiṣṭhāruhyatāṃ rathaḥ śatadhanvanidhanāyodyamaṃ kurv ity abhihitas tatheti samanvicchitavān /
GP12vipce_pu:7779: kṛtodyogau ca tāv ubhāv upalabhya śatadhanvā kṛtavarmāṇam upetya pārṣṇipūraṇakarmanimittam acodayat /
GP12vipce_pu:7781: nāhaṃ balabhadravāsudevābhyāṃ saha virodhāyālam ity uktaś cākrūram acodayat /

GP12vipce_pu:7785: yady asmatparitrāṇāsamarthaṃ bhavān ātmānam avagacchati tad ayam asmanmaṇiḥ saṃgṛhya rakṣyatām ityuktaḥ so 'py āha /
GP12vipce_pu:7786: yady antāyām apy avasthāyāṃ na kasmaicid bhavān kathayiṣyati tad aham enaṃ grahīṣyāmīti /

GP12vipce_pu:7790: sā ca vaḍavā śatayojanapramāṇamārgam atītya punar api vāhyamānā mithilāvanoddeśe prāṇān utsasarja /

GP12vipce_pu:7793: tāvad atraiva syandane bhavatā stheyam aham enam adhamācāraṃ padātinam anugamya yāvad ghātayāmi /

GP12vipce_pu:7796: tathety uktvā balabhadro ratha eva tasthau /

GP12vipce_pu:7798: taccharīrāmbarādiṣu ca bahuprakāram anviṣyann api syamantakaṃ maṇiṃ nāvāpa yadā tadopagamya balabhadram āha /
GP12vipce_pu:7802: dhik tvāṃ yas tvam evam arthalipsur etac ca te bhrātṛtvān marṣaye /
GP12vipce_pu:7804: na me dvārakayā na bandhubhiḥ kāryam alam ebhir mamāgrato 'līkaśapathair ity ākṣipya taṃ kathaṃcit prasādyamāno 'pi na tasthau /
GP12vipce_pu:7806: janakaś cārghyapūrvakam enaṃ gṛhaṃ praveśayām āsa /
GP12vipce_pu:7809: yāvac ca janakarājagṛhe balabhadro 'vatasthe tāvad dhārtarāṣṭro duryodhanas tatsakāśād gadāśikṣām aśikṣata /
GP12vipce_pu:7810: varṣatrayānte ca babhrūgrasenaprabhṛtibhir yādavair na tad ratnaṃ kṛṣṇenāpahṛtam iti kṛtāvagatibhir videhapurīṃ gatvā baladevaḥ saṃpratyāyya dvārakām ānītaḥ // ViP_4,13.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:7812: savanagatau hi kṣatriyavaiśyau nighnan brahmahā bhavatīty ato dīkṣākavacaṃ praviṣṭa eva tasthau /
GP12vipce_pu:7813: dviṣaṣṭivarṣāṇy evaṃ tanmaṇiprabhāvāt tatropasargadurbhikṣamarakādikaṃ nābhūt // ViP_4,13.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:7814: athākrūrapakṣīyair bhojaiḥ śatrughne sātvatasya prapautre vyāpādite bhojaiḥ sahākrūro dvārakām apahāyāpakrāntaḥ // ViP_4,13.37 //
GP12vipce_pu:7817: kim yad idam ekadaiva pracuropadravāgamanam etad ālocyatām // ViP_4,13.38 //
GP12vipce_pu:7819: asyākrūrasya pitā śvaphalko yatra yatrābhūt tatra tatra durbhikṣamarakānāvṛṣtyādikaṃ nābhūt // ViP_4,13.39 //
GP12vipce_pu:7822: kāśīrājapatnyāś ca garbhe kanyāpūrvam āsīt // ViP_4,13.40 //
GP12vipce_pu:7824: evaṃ ca tasya garbhasya dvādaśa varṣāṇy aniṣkrāmato yayuḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:7826: putri kasmān na jāyase niṣkramyatām āsyaṃ te draṣṭum icchāmy ahaṃ svakāṃ ca mātaraṃ kim iti ciraṃ kleśayiṣyasīty ukte garbhasthaiva vyājahāra /
GP12vipce_pu:7827: tāta yady ekaikāṃ gāṃ dine dine brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchasi tad aham anyais tribhir varṣair asmād garbhād avaśyaṃ niṣkramiṣyāmīti /
GP12vipce_pu:7828: etac ca tadvacanam ākarṇya rājā dine dine brāhmaṇāya gāṃ prādāt /
GP12vipce_pu:7830: tatas tasyāḥ pitā gāndinīti nāma cakāra /
GP12vipce_pu:7831: tāṃ ca gāndinīṃ kanyāṃ śvaphalkāya priyopakāriṇe gṛhāgatāyārghabhūtāṃ prādāt // ViP_4,13.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:7834: katham asminn apakrānte marakadurbhikṣādyupadravā na bhaviṣyanti /

GP12vipce_pu:7836: yaduvṛddhasyāndhakasyaitad vacanam ākarṇya keśavograsenabalabhadrapurogamair yadubhiḥ kṛtāparādhatitikṣābhavam abhayaṃ dattvā śvāphalkiḥ svapuram ānītaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7837: tatra cāgatamātra eva tasya tatsthasya maṇer anubhāvad anāvṛṣṭimarakadurbhikṣavyālādyupadravaḥ śaśāma /

GP12vipce_pu:7841: tan nūnam asya sakāśe sa mahāmaṇiḥ syamantakākhyas tiṣṭhati /

GP12vipce_pu:7844: alpopādānaṃ cāsyā saṃśayam atrāsau varamaṇis tiṣṭhatīti kṛtādhyavasāyo 'nyat prayojanam uddiśya sakalayādavasamājam ātmageha evācīkarat // ViP_4,13.45 //
GP12vipce_pu:7845: tatra copaviṣṭeṣv akhileṣu yādaveṣu pūrvaprayojanam upanyasya paryavasite ca tasmin prasaṅgāgataparihāsakathām akrūreṇa saha kṛtvā janārdanas tam akrūram āha // ViP_4,13.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:7846: dānapate jānīma eva vayaṃ yathā śatadhanvanā tad akhilajagatsārabhūtaṃ syamantakaratnaṃ bhavataḥ samarpitaṃ tad etad rāṣṭropakārakaṃ bhavataḥ sakāśe tiṣṭhatīti /
GP12vipce_pu:7847: tiṣṭhatu sarva eva vayaṃ tatprabhāvaphalabhujaḥ kiṃ tv eṣa balabhadro 'smān āśaṅkitavāṃs tad asmatprītaye darśayety abhihitaḥ saratnaḥ so 'cintayat // ViP_4,13.47 //

GP12vipce_pu:7848_1: etad drakṣyantīty anveṣaṇaṃ na kṣemam iti saṃcintya tam akhilajagatkāraṇabhūtaṃ nārāyaṇam āhākrūraḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:7851: tasya ca dhāraṇakleśenāham aśeṣopabhogeṣv asaṅgimānaso na vedmi svasukhakalām api // ViP_4,13.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:7852: etāvanmātram apy aśeṣarāṣṭropakārī dhārayituṃ na śaknotīti māṃ bhavān maṃsyata ity ātmanā na coditam // ViP_4,13.50 //

GP12vipce_pu:7858: sa eṣa maṇir yaḥ śatadhanvanāsmākaṃ samarpito yasyāyaṃ sa enaṃ gṛhṇātv iti /

GP12vipce_pu:7864: etad dhi maṇiratnam ātmasaṃśodhanāya eṣāṃ yadūnāṃ darśitam etac ca mama balabhadrasya ca sāmānyaṃ pitṛdhanaṃ caitat satyabhāmāyā nānyasya // ViP_4,13.54 //
GP12vipce_pu:7865: etat sarvakālaṃ śucinā brahmacaryeṇa dhriyamāṇam aśeṣarāṣṭrasyopakārakam aśucinā dhriyamāṇam ādhāram eva hanti // ViP_4,13.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:7869: tad ayaṃ yaduloko 'haṃ balabhadraḥ satyā ca tvāṃ dānapate prārthayāmaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:7872: tvayānyan na vaktavyam ity ukto dānapatis tathety uktvā jagrāha ca tan mahāratnam /

GP12vipce_pu:7874: ity etāṃ bhagavato mithyābhiśastikṣālanāṃ yaḥ smarati na tasya kadācid alpāpi mithyābhiśastir bhavati /

GP12vipce_pu:7884: tasmāc ca śvaphalkas tatprabhāvaḥ kathita eva /

GP12vipce_pu:7896: devavān upadevaḥ sahadevo devarakṣito devakasyāpi catvāraḥ putrāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7897: teṣāṃ ca vṛkadevopadevā devarakṣitā śrīdevā śāntidevā sahadevā devakī ca sapta bhaginyaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7898: tāś ca sarvā eva vasudeva upayeme /
GP12vipce_pu:7900: kaṃsā kaṃsavatī sutanū rāṣṭrapālī kaṅkī ca ugrasenatanūjāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7902: vidūrathāc chūraḥ śūrāc chamī śaminaḥ pratikṣatraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7903: tasmāt svayaṃbhojas tataś ca hṛdikaḥ // ViP_4,14.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:7905: devamīḍhuṣasya śūrasya māriṣā nāma patny abhavat // ViP_4,14.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:7906: tasyāṃ cāsau daśa putrān ajanayad vasudevapūrvān /

GP12vipce_pu:7910: pṛthā śrutadevā śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravā rājādhidevī ca vasudevādīnāṃ pañca bhaginyo 'bhavan // ViP_4,14.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:7912: tasmai cāputrāya pṛthām ātmajāṃ vidhinā śūro dattavān /

GP12vipce_pu:7915: pūrvam anūḍhāyāś ca bhagavatā bhāsvatā kānīnaḥ karṇo nāma putro 'janyata // ViP_4,14.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:7917: nāsatyadasrābhyāṃ tasyām api nakulasahadevau pāṇḍoḥ putrau janitau /

GP12vipce_pu:7921: tasyāṃ saṃtardanādayaḥ kaikeyāḥ pañca putrā babhūvuḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7925: sa hi pūrvam apy anācāravikramasaṃpanno daityānām ādipuruṣo hiraṇyakaśipur abhūt // ViP_4,14.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:7927: punar apy akṣatavīryaśauryasaṃpatparākramaguṇaḥ samākrāntasakalatrailokyeśvarapratāpo daśānano 'bhavat // ViP_4,14.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:7928: bahukālopabhuktabhagavatsakāśād avāptaśarīrapātodbhavapuṇyaphalo 'tha bhagavatāeva rāghavarūpiṇā so 'pi nidhanam upapāditaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:7930: śiśupālatve 'pi bhagavato bhūbhārāvatāraṇāyāvatīrṇāṃśasya puṇḍarīkanayanākhyasyopari dveṣānubandham atitarāñ cakāra /
GP12vipce_pu:7931: bhagavatā ca nidhanam upanītas tatraiva paramātmabhūte manasas tadekāgratayā tatraiva sāyujyam avāpa // ViP_4,14.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:7932: bhagavān hi prasanno yathābhilaṣitaṃ dadāty aprasanno 'pi nighnan divyam anupamaṃ sthānaṃ prayacchatīti // ViP_4,14.14 //
GP12vipce_pu:7937: avāpa nihato bhogān aprāpyān amarair api // ViP_4,15.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:7938: na layaṃ tatra tenaiva nihataḥ sa kathaṃ punaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:7940: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ vara /
GP12vipce_pu:7941: kautūhalapareṇaitat pṛṣṭo me vaktum arhasi // ViP_4,15.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:7943: daityeśvarasya tu vadhāyākhilalokotpattisthitivināśakāriṇāpūrvaṃ tanugrahaṇaṃ kurvatā nṛsiṃharūpam āviṣkṛtam /
GP12vipce_pu:7944: tatra tu hiraṇyakaśipor viṣṇur ayam ity etan na manasy abhūt // ViP_4,15.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:7945_0: niratiśayapuṇyajātasamudbhūtam etat sattvam iti rajodrekapreritaikāgramatis tadbhāvanāyogāt

GP12vipce_pu:7970: suprasannādityacandrādigraham avyālādibhayaṃ svasthamānasam akhilam evaitaj jagad apāstādharmam abhavat tasmiṃś ca puṇḍarīkanayane jāyamāne // ViP_4,15.18 //

GP12vipce_pu:8003: tataś ca pauravaṃ duṣyantaṃ putram akalpayat /

GP12vipce_pu:8019: sabhānaraputraḥ kālānaraḥ kālānarāt sṛñjayaḥ sṛñjayāt puraṃjayaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:8028: aṅgasya tv anapānas tasyātmajo divirathas tasmād dharmarathaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:8033: tataś campo yaś campāṃ niveśayām āsa /

GP12vipce_pu:8039: yo 'sau gaṅgāṃ gato mañjūṣāgataṃ pṛthāpaviddhaṃ karṇaṃ putram avāpa /

GP12vipce_pu:8154: tad alam etena tasmai dīyatām ity ukte tasya mantripravareṇāśmasāriṇātatrāraṇye tapasvino vedavādavirodhavaktāraḥ prayuktāḥ // ViP_4,20.7 //

GP12vipce_pu:8166: śāṃtanor apy amaranadyāṃ gaṅgāyām udārakīrtir aśeṣaśāstrārthavid bhīṣmaḥ putro 'bhūt /

GP12vipce_pu:8171: satyavatīniyogāc ca tatputraḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano mātur vacanam anatikramaṇīyam iti vicitravīryakṣetre dhṛtarāṣṭrapāṇḍū tatprahitabhujiṣyāyāṃ ca viduraṃ utpādayām āsa // ViP_4,20.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:8173: pāṇḍor apy araṇye mṛgaśāpopahataprajananasāmarthyasya dharmavāyuśakrair yudhiṣṭhirabhīmārjunāḥ kuntyāṃ nakulasahadevau cāśvibhyāṃ mādryāṃ pañca putrāḥ samutpāditāḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:8182: arjunasyāpy ulūpyāṃ nāgakanyāyām irāvān nāma putro 'bhūt /

GP12vipce_pu:8184: subhadrāyāṃ cārbhakatve 'pi yo 'sāv atibalaparākramasamastārātirathavijetā so 'bhimanyur ajāyata /

GP12vipce_pu:8193: yo 'sau yājñavalkyād vedam adhītya kṛpād astrāṇy avāpya viṣayaviraktacittavṛttiś ca śaunakopadeśād ātmavijñānapravīṇaḥ paraṃ nirvāṇam āpsyati // ViP_4,21.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8198: uṣṇāc citrarathas tataḥ śucirathas tasmād vṛṣṇimāṃs tataḥ suṣeṇaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:8200: tato n.paṃjayas tato mṛdus tasmāt tigmas tigmād bṛhadrathaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8202: tasmāc codayana udayanād ahīnaras tataś ca daṇḍapāṇis tato niramitras tasmāc ca kṣemakaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:8211: tasmād urukṣayas tato vatso vatsād vatsavyūhaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:8213: tato bṛhadaśvas tatsūnur bhānurathas tasya pratītāśvas tasyāpi supratīkaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8214: tato marudevo marudevāt sunakṣatras tasmāt kiṃnaraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8215: kiṃnara-d antarikṣas tasmāt suvarṇas tataś cāmitrajit /
GP12vipce_pu:8216: tataś ca bṛhadrājas tasyāpi dharmī dharmiṇaḥ kṛtaṃjayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8217: kṛtaṃjayād raṇaṃjayo raṇaṃjayāt saṃjayas tasmāc chākyaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8218: śākyāc chuddhodanas tasmād rāhulas tataḥ prasenajit /
GP12vipce_pu:8219: tataś ca kṣudrakas tataś ca kuṇḍakas tasmād api surathaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8220: tatputraś ca sumitro 'ntya ity ete cekṣvākavo bṛhadbalānvayāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8223: yatas taṃ prāpya rājānaṃ sa saṃsthāṃ prāpsyate kalau // ViP_4,22.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:8228: atra hi vaṃśe mahābalā jarāsaṃdhapradhānā babhūvuḥ // ViP_4,23.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:8229: jarāsaṃdhasutāt sahadevāt somāpis tasmāc chṛtavāṃs tasyāpy ayutāyus tataś ca niramitras tattanayaḥ sukṣatras tasmād api bṛhatkarmā /
GP12vipce_pu:8230: tataś ca senajit tasmāc ca śrutaṃjayas tato vipras tasya putraḥ śucināmā bhaviṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8231: tasyāpi kṣemyas tataś ca suvrataḥ suvratād dharmas tataḥ suśramaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8232: tato dṛḍhasenas tataḥ sumatis tasmāt subalas tasya sunīto bhavitā /
GP12vipce_pu:8233: tataḥ satyajit satyajito viśvajit tasyāpi ripuṃjayaḥ putraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8234: ity ete bārhadrathā bhūpatayo varṣasahasram ekaṃ bhaviṣyantīti // ViP_4,23.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8238: yo 'yaṃ ripuṃjayo nāma bārhadratho 'ntyas tasya muniko nāmāmātyo bhaviṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8239: sa cainaṃ svāminaṃ hatvā svaputraṃ pradyotanāmānam abhiṣekṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8241: tataś ca viśākhayūpas tatputro janakas tasya ca nandivardhanaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8242: ity ete 'ṣṭatriṃśaduttaram abdaśataṃ pañca pradyotāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti // ViP_4,24.1 //
GP12vipce_pu:8243: tataś ca śiśunāgas tatputraś ca kākavarṇo bhavitā /
GP12vipce_pu:8248: ity ete śaiśunāgā daśa bhūmipālās trīṇi varṣaśatāni dviṣaṣṭyadhikāni bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,24.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8249: mahānandisutaḥ śūdrāgarbhodbhavo 'tilubdho mahāpadmo nandaḥ paraśurāma ivāparo 'khilakṣatrāntakārī bhavitā // ViP_4,24.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:8251: sa caikacchatrām anullaṅghitaśāsano mahāpadmaḥ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyati // ViP_4,24.4 //
GP12vipce_pu:8254: mahāpadmas tatputrāś ca ekaṃ varṣaśatam avanīpatayo bhaviṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8255: navaitān nandān kauṭilyo brāhmaṇaḥ samuddhariṣyati // ViP_4,24.5 //
GP12vipce_pu:8259: tasyāpy aśokavardhanas tataḥ suyaśās tato daśarathas tataḥ saṃgatas tataḥ śāliśūkas tasmāt somaśarmā tasmāc chatadhanvā /
GP12vipce_pu:8261: evaṃ mauryā daśa bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanti abdaśataṃ saptatriṃśaduttaram /
GP12vipce_pu:8262: teṣām ante pṛthivīṃ śuṅgā bhokṣyanti // ViP_4,24.7 //
GP12vipce_pu:8263: puṣyamitraḥ senāpatiḥ svāminaṃ hatvā rājyaṃ kariṣyati // ViP_4,24.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:8264: asyātmajo 'gnimitras tasmāt sujyeṣṭhas tato vasumitras tasmād apy ardrakas tataḥ pulindakas tato ghoṣavasus tasmād api vajramitras tato bhāgavataḥ // ViP_4,24.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:8266: ity ete daśa śuṅgā dvādaśottaraṃ varṣaśataṃ pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8267: tataḥ kaṇvān eṣā bhūr yāsyati // ViP_4,24.10 //
GP12vipce_pu:8268: devabhūtiṃ tu śuṅgarājānaṃ vyasaninaṃ tasyaivāmātyaḥ kaṇvo vasudevanāmā nipātya svayam avanīṃ bhokṣyate /
GP12vipce_pu:8271: ete kāṇvāyanāś catvāraḥ pañcacatvāriṃśad varṣāṇi bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8272: suśarmāṇaṃ tu kāṇvaṃ svabhṛtyo balāt śiprakanāmā hatvāndhrajātīyo vasudhāṃ bhokṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8273: tataś ca kṛṣṇanāmā tadbhrātā bhūpatir bhāvī /
GP12vipce_pu:8274: tasya putraḥ śrīśātakarṇis tasyāpi pūrṇotsaṅgas tatputraś ca śātakarṇis tasmāc ca lambodaras tasmād divīlakas tato meghasvātis tataḥ paṭumān /
GP12vipce_pu:8275: tataś cāriṣṭakarmā tato hālo hālāt pattalakas tataḥ pravilla senas tataḥ sundaraḥ śātakarṇī tasmāc cakoraḥ śātakarṇī tataḥ śivasvātis tataś ca gomatīputras tatputraḥ pulimān /
GP12vipce_pu:8276: tasyāpi śātakarṇī tataḥ śivaśrīs tataḥ śivaskandhaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8277: tasmād yajñaśrīs tato vijayas tataś candraśrīs tasyāpi pulomāviḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8278: evam ete triṃśac catvāry abdaśatāni ṣaṭpañcāśadadhikāni pṛthivīṃ bhokṣyanty āndhrabhṛtyāḥ // ViP_4,24.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:8279: saptābhīrāḥ daśa gardabhilāś ca bhūbhujo bhaviṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8281: tataś cāṣṭau yavanāś caturdaśa tuṣārā muṇḍāś ca trayodaśa ekādaśa maunāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8282: ete pṛthivīṃ trayodaśavarṣaśatāni navanavatyadhikāni bhokṣyanti // ViP_4,24.12 //
GP12vipce_pu:8283: tataś ca paurā ekādaśa bhūpatayo 'bdaśatāni trīṇi mahīṃ bhokṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8284: teṣūtsanneṣu kailakilā yavanā bhūpatayo bhaviṣyanty amūrdhābhiṣiktāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8286: tataḥ puraṃjayas tato rāmacandras tasmād dharmo dharmād vaṅgaraḥ kṛtanandanaḥ suṣinandis tadbhrātā nandiyaśāḥ śiśukapravīrau caite varṣaśataṃ ṣaḍ varṣāṇi ca bhaviṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8287: tatas tatputrās trayodaśaite bāhlikāś ca trayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8288: tataḥ puṣyamitrapaṭumitrās trayodaśa mekalāś ca saptāndhrāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8294: nava nāgāḥ padmāvatyāṃ nāma puryāṃ mathurāyām anugaṅgāprayāgaṃ māgadhā guptāś ca bhokṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8299: saurāṣṭrāvantiśūdrān arbudamarubhūmiviṣayāṃś ca vrātyā dvijābhīraśūdrādyā bhokṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8301: ete ca tulyakālāḥ sarve pṛthivyāṃ bhūbhṛto bhaviṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8302_0: alpaprasādā bṛhatkopāḥ sarvakālam anṛtādharmarucayaḥ strībālagovadhakartāraḥ parasvādānarucayo
GP12vipce_pu:8302_1: 'lpasārā uditāstamitaprāyāḥ svalpāyuṣo mahecchā hy alpadharmāś ca bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,24.15 //
GP12vipce_pu:8303: taiś ca vimiśrā janapadās tacchīlavartino rājāśrayaśuṣmiṇo mlecchācāryāś ca viparyayeṇa vartamānāḥ prajāḥ kṣapayiṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8304: tataś cānudinam alpālpahrāsavyavacchedād dharmārthayor jagataḥ saṃkṣayo bhaviṣyati // ViP_4,24.16 //
GP12vipce_pu:8322: ity evam anekadoṣottare bhūmaṇḍale sarvavarṇeṣv eva yo yo balavān sa sa bhūpatir bhaviṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8323: evaṃ cātilubdhakarabhārāsahāḥ śailānām antaradroṇīḥ prajāḥ saṃśrayiṣyanti /
GP12vipce_pu:8326: na ca kaścit trayoviṃśativarṣāṇi jīviṣyati anavarataṃ cātra kaliyuge kṣayam āyāty akhila evaiṣa janaḥ kṣayam upaiṣyati // ViP_4,24.19 //
GP12vipce_pu:8327_0: śrautasmārtadharme viplavam atyantam upagate kṣīṇaprāye ca kalāv aśeṣajagatsraṣṭuś
GP12vipce_pu:8327_3: kalkirūpī jagaty atrāvatīrya sakalamlecchadasyuduṣṭācaraṇacetasām aśeṣāṇām aparicchinnamāhātmyaśaktiḥ kṣayaṃ kariṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8329: anantaraṃ cāśeṣakaler avasāne niśāvasānaprabuddhānāṃ teṣām eva janapadānām amalasphaṭikaviśuddhā matayo bhaviṣyanti // ViP_4,24.20 //
GP12vipce_pu:8330: teṣāṃ ca bījabhūtānām aśeṣamanuṣyāṇāṃ pariṇatānām api tatkālakṛtānām apatyaprasūtir bhaviṣyati /
GP12vipce_pu:8331: tāni ca tadapatyāni kṛtayugadharmānusārīṇy eva bhaviṣyantīti // ViP_4,24.21 //
GP12vipce_pu:8333: yadā candraś ca sūryaś ca yadā tiṣyabṛhaspatī /
GP12vipce_pu:8334: ekarāśau sameṣyanti bhaviṣyati tadā kṛtam // ViP_4,24.22 //
GP12vipce_pu:8335: atītā vartamānāś ca tathaivānāgatāś ca ye /
GP12vipce_pu:8336: ete vaṃśeṣu bhūpālāḥ kathitā munisattama // ViP_4,24.23 //
GP12vipce_pu:8338: etad varṣasahasraṃ tu jñeyaṃ pañcadaśottaram // ViP_4,24.24 //
GP12vipce_pu:8339: saptarṣīṇāṃ tu yau pūrvau dṛśyete uditau divi /
GP12vipce_pu:8340: tayos tu madhye nakṣatraṃ dṛśyate yat samaṃ niśi /
GP12vipce_pu:8341: tena saptarṣayo yuktās tiṣṭhanty abdaśataṃ nṛṇām // ViP_4,24.25 //
GP12vipce_pu:8342: te tu pārīkṣite kāle maghāsv āsan dvijottama /
GP12vipce_pu:8343: tadā pravṛttaś ca kalir dvādaśābdaśatātmakaḥ // ViP_4,24.26 //
GP12vipce_pu:8344: yadaiva bhagavadviṣṇor aṃśo yāto divaṃ dvija /
GP12vipce_pu:8347: tāvat pṛthvīpariṣvaṅge samartho nābhavat kaliḥ // ViP_4,24.28 //
GP12vipce_pu:8348: gate sanātanasyāṃśe viṣṇos tatra bhuvo divam /
GP12vipce_pu:8349: tatyāja sānujo rājyaṃ dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ // ViP_4,24.29 //
GP12vipce_pu:8350: viparītāni dṛṣṭvā ca nimittāni sa pāṇḍavaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8351: yāte kṛṣṇe cakārātha so 'bhiṣekaṃ parīkṣitaḥ // ViP_4,24.30 //
GP12vipce_pu:8353: tadā nandāt prabhṛty eṣa kalir vṛddhiṃ gamiṣyati // ViP_4,24.31 //
GP12vipce_pu:8354: yasmin kṛṣṇo divaṃ yātas tasminn eva tadāhani /
GP12vipce_pu:8355: pratipannaṃ kaliyugaṃ tasya saṃkhyāṃ nibodha me // ViP_4,24.32 //
GP12vipce_pu:8357: ṣaṣṭiṃ caiva sahasrāṇi bhaviṣyaty eṣa vai kaliḥ // ViP_4,24.33 //
GP12vipce_pu:8358: śatāni tāni divyāni sapta pañca ca saṃkhyayā /
GP12vipce_pu:8359: niḥśeṣeṇa tatas tasmin bhaviṣyati punaḥ kṛtam // ViP_4,24.34 //
GP12vipce_pu:8360: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca dvijasattama /
GP12vipce_pu:8361: yuge yuge mahātmānaḥ samatītāḥ sahasraśaḥ // ViP_4,24.35 //
GP12vipce_pu:8363: punaruktabahutvāt tu na mayā parikīrtitā // ViP_4,24.36 //
GP12vipce_pu:8366: kṛte yuga ihāgatya kṣatraprāvartakau hi tau /
GP12vipce_pu:8370: kalau tu bījabhūtās te kecit tiṣṭhanti bhūtale /
GP12vipce_pu:8372: eṣa tūddeśato vaṃśas tavokto bhūbhujāṃ mayā /
GP12vipce_pu:8373: nikhilo gadituṃ śakyo naiva janmaśatair api // ViP_4,24.41 //
GP12vipce_pu:8374: ete cānye ca bhūpālā yair atra kṣitimaṇḍale /
GP12vipce_pu:8376: kathaṃ mameyam acalā matputrasya kathaṃ mahī /
GP12vipce_pu:8377: madvaṃśasyeti cintārtā jagmur antam ime nṛpāḥ // ViP_4,24.43 //
GP12vipce_pu:8378: tebhyaḥ pūrvatarāś cānye tebhyas tebhyas tathāpare /
GP12vipce_pu:8379: bhaviṣyāś caiva yāsyanti teṣām anye ca ye 'dhy anu // ViP_4,24.44 //
GP12vipce_pu:8382: maitreya pṛthivīgītāḥ ślokāś cātra nibodha tān /
GP12vipce_pu:8383: yān āha dharmadhvajine janakāyāsito muniḥ // ViP_4,24.46 //
GP12vipce_pu:8385: katham eṣa narendrāṇāṃ moho buddhimatām api /
GP12vipce_pu:8387: pūrvam ātmajayaṃ kṛtvā jetum icchanti mantriṇaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8388: tato bhṛtyāṃś ca paurāṃś ca jigīṣante tathā ripūn // ViP_4,24.48 //
GP12vipce_pu:8390: ity āsaktadhiyo mṛtyuṃ na paśyanty avidūragam // ViP_4,24.49 //
GP12vipce_pu:8392: kiyad ātmajayād etan muktir ātmajaye phalam // ViP_4,24.50 //
GP12vipce_pu:8393: utsṛjya pūrvajā yātā yāṃ nādāya gataḥ pitā /
GP12vipce_pu:8394: tāṃ mameti vimūḍhatvāj jetum icchanti pārthivāḥ // ViP_4,24.51 //
GP12vipce_pu:8397: pṛthvī mameyaṃ sakalā mameyaṃ madanvayasyāpi ca śāśvateyam /
GP12vipce_pu:8398: yo yo mṛto hy atra babhūva rājā kubuddhir āsīd iti tasya tasya // ViP_4,24.53 //
GP12vipce_pu:8399: dṛṣṭvā mamatvādṛtacittam ekaṃ vihāya māṃ mṛtyupathaṃ vrajantam /
GP12vipce_pu:8400: tasyānvayasthasya kathaṃ mamatvaṃ hṛdy āspadaṃ matprabhavaṃ karoti // ViP_4,24.54 //
GP12vipce_pu:8401: pṛthvī mamaiṣāśu parityajaināṃ vadanti ye dūtamukhaiḥ svaśatrum /
GP12vipce_pu:8402: narādhipās teṣu mamātihāsaḥ punaś ca mūḍheṣu dayābhyupaiti // ViP_4,24.55 //
GP12vipce_pu:8404: ity ete dharaṇīgītāḥ ślokā maitreya yaiḥ śrutaiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8405: mamatvaṃ vilayaṃ yāti tāpanyastaṃ yathā himam // ViP_4,24.56 //
GP12vipce_pu:8406: ity eṣa kathitaḥ samyaṅ manor vaṃśo mayā tava /
GP12vipce_pu:8407: yatra sthitipravṛttasya viṣṇor aṃśāṃśakā nṛpāḥ // ViP_4,24.57 //
GP12vipce_pu:8408: śṛṇoti ya imaṃ bhaktyā manor vaṃśam anukramāt /
GP12vipce_pu:8409: tasya pāpam aśeṣaṃ vai praṇaśyaty amalātmanaḥ // ViP_4,24.58 //
GP12vipce_pu:8415: kṛtān kālena balinā kathāśeṣān narādhipān // ViP_4,24.61 //
GP12vipce_pu:8417: dravyādau vā kṛtaprajño mamatvaṃ kurute naraḥ // ViP_4,24.62 //
GP12vipce_pu:8418: taptaṃ tapo yaiḥ puruṣapravīrair udbāhubhir varṣagaṇān anekān /
GP12vipce_pu:8419: iṣṭāś ca yajñā balino 'tivīryāḥ kṛtās tu kālena kathāvaśeṣāḥ // ViP_4,24.63 //
GP12vipce_pu:8420: pṛthuḥ samastān pracacāra lokān avyāhato yo 'rividāricakraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8421: sa kālavātābhihato vinaṣṭaḥ kṣiptaṃ yathā śālmalitūlam agnau // ViP_4,24.64 //
GP12vipce_pu:8422: yaḥ kārtavīryo bubhuje samastān dvīpān samākramya hatāricakraḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8423: kathāprasaṅgeṣv abhidhīyamānaḥ sa eva saṃkalpavikalpahetuḥ // ViP_4,24.65 //
GP12vipce_pu:8425: bhasmāpi jātaṃ na kathaṃ kṣaṇena bhrūbhaṅgapātena dhig antakasya // ViP_4,24.66 //
GP12vipce_pu:8426: kathāśarīratvam avāpa yad vai māndhātṛnāmā bhuvi cakravartī /
GP12vipce_pu:8427: śrutvāpi taṃ ko hi karoti sādhur mamatvam ātmany api mandacetāḥ // ViP_4,24.67 //
GP12vipce_pu:8428: bhagīrathādyāḥ sagaraḥ kakutstho daśānano rāghavalakṣmaṇau ca /
GP12vipce_pu:8429: yudhiṣṭhirādyāś ca babhūvur ete satyaṃ na mithyā kva nu te na vidmaḥ // ViP_4,24.68 //
GP12vipce_pu:8430: ye sāmprataṃ ye ca nṛpā bhaviṣyāḥ proktā mayā vipravarogravīryāḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8431: ye te tathānye ca tathābhidheyāḥ sarve bhaviṣyanti yathaiva pūrve // ViP_4,24.69 //
GP12vipce_pu:8432: etad viditvā na nareṇa kāryaṃ mamatvam ātmany api paṇḍitena /
GP12vipce_pu:8433: tiṣṭhantu tāvat tanayātmajāyāḥ kṣetrādayo ye tu śarīrato 'nye // ViP_4,24.70 //
GP12vipce_pu:8442: viṣṇos taṃ vistareṇāhaṃ śrotum icchāmy aśeṣataḥ // ViP_5,1.2 //
GP12vipce_pu:8444: aṃśāṃśenāvatīryorvyāṃ tatra tāni mune vada // ViP_5,1.3 //
GP12vipce_pu:8446: maitreya śrūyatām etad yat pṛṣṭo 'ham iha tvayā /
GP12vipce_pu:8450: kaṃsas tayor vararathaṃ codayām āsa sārathiḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8452: athāntarikṣe vāg uccaiḥ kaṃsam ābhāṣya sādaram /
GP12vipce_pu:8454: yām enāṃ vahase mūḍha saha bhartrā rathe sthitām /
GP12vipce_pu:8455: asyās tavāṣṭamo garbhaḥ prāṇān apahariṣyati // ViP_5,1.8 //
GP12vipce_pu:8457: ity ākarṇya samādāya khaḍgaṃ kaṃso mahābalaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:8458: devakīṃ hantum ārabdho vasudevo 'bravīd idam // ViP_5,1.9 //
GP12vipce_pu:8459: na hantavyā mahābhāga devakī bhavatā tava /
GP12vipce_pu:8462: tathety āha ca taṃ kaṃso vasudevaṃ dvijottama /
GP12vipce_pu:8463: na ghātayām āsa ca tāṃ devakīṃ tasya gauravāt // ViP_5,1.11 //
GP12vipce_pu:8465: jagāma dharaṇī merau samāje tridivaukasām // ViP_5,1.12 //

GP12vipce_pu:12827: dharmadhenuṃ jaghānograḥ śārdūlo vijane vane // ViP_6,6.13 //
GP12vipce_pu:12828: tato rājā hatāṃ jñātvā dhenuṃ vyāghreṇa ṛtvijaḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:12830: te cocur na vayaṃ vidmaḥ kaśeruḥ pṛcchyatām iti /

GP12vipce_pu:12848: mṛgāṇāṃ vada pṛṣṭheṣu mūḍha kṛṣṇājinaṃ na kim /

GP12vipce_pu:12853: khāṇḍikya saṃśayaṃ praṣṭuṃ bhavantam aham āgataḥ /

GP12vipce_pu:12858: tam ūcur mantriṇo vadhyo ripur eṣa vaśaṃ gataḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12859: hate tu pṛthivī sarvā tava vaśyā bhaviṣyati // ViP_6,6.27 //
GP12vipce_pu:12860: khāṇḍikyaś cāha tān sarvān evam etan na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12vipce_pu:12861: hate tu pṛthivī sarvā mama vaśyā bhaviṣyati // ViP_6,6.28 //
